        <div id="readme" class="Box-body readme blob js-code-block-container p-5 p-xl-6 gist-border-0">
    <article class="markdown-body entry-content container-lg" itemprop="text"><h1 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-changelog" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#changelog"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Changelog</h1>
<h2 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-3200-2022-01-26" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#3200-2022-01-26"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/compare/v31.1.0...v32.0.0">32.0.0</a> (2022-01-26)</h2>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-release-highlights" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#release-highlights"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Release highlights</h3>
<p dir="auto">We are happy to announce the release of CKEditor 5 v32.0.0.</p>
<p dir="auto">This release introduces the following new features:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>The environment was upgraded to use <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10668">webpack 5</a> and <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10972">Node 14</a>.</li>
<li>Introduced <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/1032">support for the list <code>start</code> and <code>reversed</code> attributes</a>, including <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/11043">when pasting from Word</a>.</li>
<li>Added <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9741">support for autocomplete with space in the mention plugin</a>.</li>
<li>Improved <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10891">handling of <code>&lt;script&gt;</code> elements in the General HTML support (GHS) feature</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Read more in the blog post: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v32.0.0-with-new-list-properties-support-for-the-script-tag-and-enhanced-mentions/" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v32.0.0-with-new-list-properties-support-for-the-script-tag-and-enhanced-mentions/</a></p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-major-breaking-changes-ℹ️" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#major-breaking-changes-ℹ️"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MAJOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: <code>Batch#type</code> was deprecated. It will always return the <code>'default'</code> value and reading it will log a warning in the console. Use <code>Batch#isUndoable</code>, <code>Batch#isLocal</code>, <code>Batch#isUndo</code> and <code>Batch#isTyping</code> instead.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Multiple changes to <code>Revision</code> properties were introduced that impact revision history integrations. Introduced <code>#fromRevision</code> and <code>#toRevision</code> properties. Renamed <code>#data</code> to <code>#diffData</code>. The <code>#isLocked</code> property was removed. These changes have an impact on what data should be saved in your database and how the revision history plugin should be integrated. Please refer to the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/builds/guides/migration/migration-to-32.html" rel="nofollow">migration guide</a> and the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_revision-history_revision-Revision.html" rel="nofollow">API documentation</a> to learn more about these changes.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: The <code>RevisionHistoryAdapter</code> interface has changed. Also, <code>RevisionTracker</code> no longer uses <code>RevisionHistoryAdapter#getRevisions()</code> to fetch revisions during the editor initialization. You should add revisions data in your integration plugin. Please refer to the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/builds/guides/migration/migration-to-32.html" rel="nofollow">migration guide</a> and the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/features/revision-history/revision-history-integration.html#adapter-integration" rel="nofollow">documentation</a> to learn how to update your revision history integration.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: <code>RevisionTracker#updateRevision()</code> was removed while the <code>#update()</code> and <code>#saveRevision()</code> methods have been introduced instead. This may have an impact on your revision history integration (e.g. with autosave). Please refer to the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/builds/guides/migration/migration-to-32.html" rel="nofollow">migration guide</a> and the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/features/revision-history/revision-history-integration.html#autosave-integration" rel="nofollow">documentation</a> to learn how to update your revision history integration.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-typing" rel="nofollow">typing</a></strong>: <code>Input#isInput()</code> was removed. Use <code>Batch#isTyping</code> instead.</li>
<li>Upgraded the minimal versions of Node.js to <code>14.0.0</code> due to the end of LTS.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MINOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The string value for the <code>Batch</code> type and <code>Model#enqueueChange()</code> is now deprecated. Using a string value will log a warning in the console. Use an object value instead. For more information, refer to the API documentation.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: <code>RevisionTracker#isLocked</code> was removed.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: The flow for saving and updating a revision has changed. See the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/features/revision-history/revision-history-integration.html#how-revisions-are-updated-and-saved" rel="nofollow">documentation</a> to learn what it looks like after the changes.</li>
<li>The previously named <code>#_getTemplate()</code> methods in <code>CommentThreadView</code>, <code>CommentView</code> and <code>SuggestionThreadView</code>  were renamed to <code>#getTemplate()</code>. These methods are used in annotations customization when changing the default templates.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-features" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#features"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Features</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-autosave" rel="nofollow">autosave</a></strong>: <code>Autosave#save()</code> will now return a promise that is resolved when the autosave callback has finished. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/3e2f1b3458c44dda3e86f326192135a9e1fa3042">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-comments" rel="nofollow">comments</a></strong>: Introduced <code>Annotation#refreshVisibility()</code> and <code>Annotations#refreshVisibility()</code> that refresh the visibility of the annotations based on the visibility of their target elements.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-comments" rel="nofollow">comments</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>Annotation#isVisible</code> observable property that allows controlling the visibility of the annotation.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-support" rel="nofollow">html-support</a></strong>: Added support for the <code>&lt;script&gt;</code> elements. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10891">#10891</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/277a5919870e69c330337f13a7df92dd9999fbc3">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: Implemented the numbered list properties UI. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10877">#10877</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/9be585f8b7d6d7ef504a48b101c4961137f3e8da">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: Added support for reversed lists and list start index (<code>reversed</code> and <code>start</code> HTML attributes). Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10673">#10673</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/d0806398ddeea527c9a858b70add8e4528fb502c">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-mention" rel="nofollow">mention</a></strong>: The mention plugin now allows searching mentions that include space characters. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9741">#9741</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/d95bc68459ccd4b580e19cfcc1b660d743f52b52">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-paste-from-office" rel="nofollow">paste-from-office</a></strong>: Added support for start index in ordered lists. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/11043">#11043</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/807b60f948a96da1d1b058230cfcef3251f67852">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Introduced <code>Revision#fromVersion</code> and <code>Revision#toVersion</code>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Introduced new methods in the <code>RevisionHistory</code> plugin: <code>#addRevisionData()</code>, <code>#getRevision()</code>, <code>#getRevisions()</code>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>InputNumberView</code> class and the <code>createLabeledInputNumber()</code> helper for creating number inputs (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10877">#10877</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/638ef662f630da3478bf4a5d2b94fe87c2e497b8">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>InputView</code> class for other inputs such as <code>InputTextView</code> to inherit from (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10877">#10877</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/9be585f8b7d6d7ef504a48b101c4961137f3e8da">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-utils" rel="nofollow">utils</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>isVisible()</code> helper to detect whether DOM elements are visible to the user in the DOM (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10877">#10877</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/9be585f8b7d6d7ef504a48b101c4961137f3e8da">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Replaced <code>Batch#type</code> with a set of flags: <code>Batch#isUndoable</code>, <code>Batch#isLocal</code>, <code>Batch#isUndo</code>, <code>Batch#isTyping</code> which better represent the batch type. The <code>Batch</code> constructor and <code>Model#enqueueChange()</code> now expect an object. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10967">#10967</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/83538a860d6d914d48790d8963ce0c0a5b54678e">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-bug-fixes" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bug-fixes"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Bug fixes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-comments" rel="nofollow">comments</a></strong>: DOM listeners will be detached when destroying annotation collections, which prevents memory leaks.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: <code>HTMLDataProcessor#toView()</code> should preserve leading non-layout elements while loading partial HTML. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/11110">#11110</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b355feb3d0a0aea0f052a7c24fe8691f7fa2518e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: The list properties feature will no longer crash when removing content from the last list item which is next to a non-list element. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8642">#8642</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8b69b9569c1525bedeed6932397dead9f7c41ff1">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-pagination" rel="nofollow">pagination</a></strong>: The page number input view should not stretch. Used <code>InputNumberView</code> to render the page number input in <code>PageNavigatorView</code>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Fixed a crash when a revision contained overlapping suggestions.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Fixed a crash when content selected by triple-click was copied and pasted into the editor.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-track-changes" rel="nofollow">track-changes</a></strong>: Fixed a crash that was happening during real-time editing when one of the users used <kbd>Enter</kbd> inside a suggestion.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-typing" rel="nofollow">typing</a></strong>: Fixed an editor crash when an unrecognized transformation was provided in the configuration (as a string). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/83538a860d6d914d48790d8963ce0c0a5b54678e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-watchdog" rel="nofollow">watchdog</a></strong>: Prevented <code>EditorWatchdog</code> from crashing during the editor destruction process when one of the plugins tries to change the data at that moment. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10643">#10643</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/9151ef738c3ca766d093adddb99df1667c145379">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-other-changes" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#other-changes"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Other changes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-autosave" rel="nofollow">autosave</a></strong>: The <code>Autosave</code> plugin will now ignore changes coming from remote clients during real-time collaboration. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9233">#9233</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/3e2f1b3458c44dda3e86f326192135a9e1fa3042">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-build-decoupled-document" rel="nofollow">build-decoupled-document</a></strong>: Enabled the <code>startIndex</code> and <code>reversed</code> list properties in the document build. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/11037">#11037</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/99c818c7b9ddf62aa958b9d265de43e3c78b7e66">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-comments" rel="nofollow">comments</a></strong>: Renamed <code>CommentThreadView#_getTemplate()</code> to <code>#getTemplate()</code>. Renamed <code>CommentView#_getTemplate()</code> to <code>#getTemplate()</code>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: Renamed the <code>ListStyle</code> plugin to <code>ListProperties</code>. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10964">#10964</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/82ce2e9671b8ec98fb20f3ee647cca94ec421949">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-real-time-collaboration" rel="nofollow">real-time-collaboration</a></strong>: Collaboration updates will now be sent with shorter delays after they are rejected. This should allow for a better user experience when multiple users are typing at the same time.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-real-time-collaboration" rel="nofollow">real-time-collaboration</a></strong>: The <code>RealTimeCollaborationClient#offset</code> property is now private.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-real-time-collaboration" rel="nofollow">real-time-collaboration</a></strong>: The real-time collaboration feature will now create batches with the <code>#isLocal</code> flag set to <code>false</code>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Renamed <code>Revision#data</code> to <code>Revision#diffData</code>. The <code>Revision#isLocked</code> property was removed.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: The <code>RevisionHistoryAdapter</code> interface has changed. Removed <code>#getRevisions()</code>, <code>#updateRevision()</code> and <code>#addRevision()</code>. Added <code>#updateRevisions()</code>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: The revision history UI will now be blocked if the editor is in read-only mode.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Added the <code>index</code> parameter in <code>RevisionRepository#addRevision()</code>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Removed <code>RevisionTracker#isLocked</code>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Removed <code>RevisionTracker#updateRevision()</code> and added <code>#update()</code> and <code>#saveRevision()</code> instead.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: <code>RevisionTracker</code> no longer uses <code>RevisionHistoryAdapter#getRevisions()</code> to fetch revisions during the editor initialization.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: An error is now thrown when the revision history plugin configuration is missing.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: <code>RevisionHistoryAdapter#getRevision()</code> and <code>#updateRevisions()</code> now receive the <code>#channelId</code> parameter.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-track-changes" rel="nofollow">track-changes</a></strong>: Renamed <code>SuggestionThreadView#_getTemplate()</code> to <code>#getTemplate()</code>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-typing" rel="nofollow">typing</a></strong>: The typing feature will now create batches with the <code>#isTyping</code> property set to <code>true</code>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/83538a860d6d914d48790d8963ce0c0a5b54678e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: <code>FocusCycler</code> should skip elements that are invisible to the user (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10877">#10877</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/9be585f8b7d6d7ef504a48b101c4961137f3e8da">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-undo" rel="nofollow">undo</a></strong>: The undo feature will now create batches with the <code>#isUndo</code> property set to <code>true</code>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/83538a860d6d914d48790d8963ce0c0a5b54678e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-users" rel="nofollow">users</a></strong>: The anonymous user will now be added to the <code>Users</code> plugin automatically when the editor initializes.</li>
<li>Updated translations. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4465bcbc057fc2c87f7431ba588fe417609dec3b">commit</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/e4b9c643dd035361df14ec503bb1bdcfa858a01a">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Updated the required version of Node.js to 14. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10972">#10972</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/0537006c6bfb3a946a0293f318ecc67f4c18f51d">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Project migration to webpack 5. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10668">#10668</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/d312ab630000f84f232ff2c372cdfc53e06b7f16">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>

<h2 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-3110-2021-12-03" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#3110-2021-12-03"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/compare/v31.0.0...v31.1.0">31.1.0</a> (2021-12-03)</h2>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-release-highlights-1" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#release-highlights-1"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Release highlights</h3>
<p dir="auto">We are happy to announce the release of CKEditor 5 v31.1.0.</p>
<p dir="auto">This release introduces the following new features:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9326">Support for <kbd>Shift</kbd>+<kbd>Delete</kbd> on Windows to cut the selected content</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/1381">Possibility to open a link with <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>/<kbd>Cmd</kbd>+click or <kbd>Alt</kbd>+<kbd>Enter</kbd></a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/builds/guides/integration/features-html-output-overview.html" rel="nofollow">Mark the default output for features in the HTML output guide</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">There were also a few bug fixes:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10628">Selection was sometimes not merged correctly</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7707">It was almost impossible to click certain buttons in the balloon toolbar (Safari, iOS)</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8510">The editor builder <code>defaultConfig.language</code> did not apply to <code>editor.locale</code></a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10719">Find and replace did not find whole words that are next to each other</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10279">Figure tag got duplicated when the General HTML Support configuration allows all</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Read more in the blog post: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v31.1.0-with-enhanced-copy-and-paste-and-reconnection-handling/" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v31.1.0-with-enhanced-copy-and-paste-and-reconnection-handling/</a></p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-1" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-1"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MINOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Changed <code>table</code> elements' attributes' names introduced by the <code>TablePropertiesEditing</code> plugin by prefixing them with <code>table</code> to be in line with other plugins' attributes naming. The affected attribute include: <code>borderStyle</code>, <code>borderColor</code>, <code>borderWidth</code>, <code>backgroundColor</code>, <code>alignment</code>, <code>width</code>, <code>height</code>. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9369">#9369</a>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Changed <code>tableCell</code> elements' attributes' names introduced by the <code>TableCellPropertiesEditing</code> plugin by prefixing them with <code>tableCell</code> to be in line with other plugins' attribute naming. The affected attributes include: <code>backgroundColor</code>, <code>padding</code>, <code>width</code>, <code>height</code>, <code>borderStyle</code>, <code>borderColor</code>, <code>borderWidth</code>, <code>verticalAlignment</code>, <code>horizontalAlignment</code>. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9369">#9369</a>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The <code>upcastBorderStyles()</code> helper parameters were modified (added the <code>modelAttributes</code> param).</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-features-1" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#features-1"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Features</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-comments" rel="nofollow">comments</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>AnnotationsUIs#refilterAnnotations()</code> method which runs annotation UI filtering callback against all annotations and moves them to proper annotation UIs (or removes them).</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Added the possibility to open a link by <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>/<kbd>Cmd</kbd>+click or <kbd>Alt</kbd>+<kbd>Enter</kbd>. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/1381">#1381</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/654410f9286222232bb38237516421e4d97fa9da">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-track-changes" rel="nofollow">track-changes</a></strong>: Introduced color boxes for color-related suggestions.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-utils" rel="nofollow">utils</a></strong>: Introduced <code>env.isiOS</code> for detection of user agents running in iOS environments (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7707">#7707</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/89b5315550e1dbcf26bc9cb4678931670b9bb52c">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-bug-fixes-1" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bug-fixes-1"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Bug fixes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-core" rel="nofollow">core</a></strong>: Support language configuration passed in <code>defaultConfig</code> option through editor's constructor. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8510">#8510</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/6c22bb509e299319cebec18eb980ce9ed079d905">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Merge intersecting ranges that are not adjacent to each other on ranges array. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10628">#10628</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/92565ab6656a1e71e9687a53fa549aaf514f46fd">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-find-and-replace" rel="nofollow">find-and-replace</a></strong>: Replace functionality no longer replaces text when 'Replace with...' input is focused and user hits the <kbd>Enter</kbd> key but the search criteria changed. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10712">#10712</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4bc96460753133d24c9cd660efd5b4418c320267">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-find-and-replace" rel="nofollow">find-and-replace</a></strong>: Fixed adjacent whole words being missed by find and replace. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10719">#10719</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5d466b59231fe59b9c0bcfbab3cd6acff90a94ba">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Manual decorators on the linked inline images should be preserved while loading editor content. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10828">#10828</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/6d0b8da4997a5e29c5c4a125c9c6e670f49e8af4">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The <code>&lt;figure&gt;</code> element should not get replicated while GHS is enabled. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10279">#10279</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/634d4241544a7278a085c820720c8abb35f426c3">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-real-time-collaboration" rel="nofollow">real-time-collaboration</a></strong>: The whole reconnection mechanism was improved. More reconnection scenarios are now handled without editor crashing or data loss. <strong>Note: these changes require Collaboration Server On-Premises in version higher than <code>4.2.0</code>. Otherwise, the fix will not be applied.</strong></li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Disabled alignment button on main editor toolbar for tables in order to have a more unified behavior. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9369">#9369</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/e28354821506cad4fb01d45e9adff3077a2843e2">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-track-changes" rel="nofollow">track-changes</a></strong>: Creating document color suggestions no longer causes the editor to crash.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: Changed the look and position of the <code>BalloonToolbar</code> in Safari on iOS to avoid clash with native text selection handles. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7707">#7707</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/89b5315550e1dbcf26bc9cb4678931670b9bb52c">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-utils" rel="nofollow">utils</a></strong>: Fixed <code>DomEmitterMixin</code> to correctly manage listeners for different options (<code>useCapture</code> &amp; <code>usePassive</code>) set for the same DOM node. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7830">#7830</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/fe1110631bb927dc216c619d90da0476e1752397">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>

<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Allowed unsafe view element attributes so they get rendered in the editing pipeline. Attribute names can be specified when creating elements using <code>DowncastWriter</code> (<code>DowncastWriter#createAttributeElement()</code>, <code>DowncastWriter#createContainerElement()</code>, etc.). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ecc18324f4c5fe3e5c12c46d1d127922734dee9c">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-track-changes" rel="nofollow">track-changes</a></strong>: Changed suggestion description for a highlighted text fragment.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-typing" rel="nofollow">typing</a></strong>: Added support for the <kbd>Shift</kbd>+<kbd>Delete</kbd> keystroke on Windows to cut the selected content. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9326">#9326</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5a1a835fc136b0e1667084d63da55a6ac6e7080f">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Updated translations. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5066d1e519c545977e7f1609cb44994fc4a5ef3c">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>

<h2 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-3100-2021-10-25" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#3100-2021-10-25"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/compare/v30.0.0...v31.0.0">31.0.0</a> (2021-10-25)</h2>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-release-highlights-2" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#release-highlights-2"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Release highlights</h3>
<p dir="auto">We are happy to announce the release of CKEditor 5 v31.0.0.</p>
<p dir="auto">This release introduces the following new features:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10676">Introduce the <code>Command#affectsData</code> property</a> to indicate whether a given command should stay enabled in editor modes with restricted write permissions. This solves the frequently reported problems of the availability of some editor features, such as export to PDF or Word, select all or find, in such editor modes as read-only, comments-only or restricted editing.</li>
<li>The mentions feature has gained the <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10479">ability to customize the max number of items in the list after typing the trigger character</a>.</li>
<li>New <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5-collaboration-samples/">collaboration features samples</a> are available:
<ul dir="auto">
<li>For the React integration that will implement the context feature, as well as the watchdog.</li>
<li>For comments outside the editor with offline comments.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>The <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10594">comment</a> and <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10598">export to Word</a> feature icons were improved.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6682">Three <kbd>Enter</kbd> clicks at the end of a code block</a> are now necessary to escape it.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">There were also a few bug fixes:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>The <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8814">link</a>, mention, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9605">inline image</a>, and comment marker cannot be selected by mouse drag if the link is at the edge of a block.</li>
<li>A table balloon is no longer rendered in the <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6408">wrong place after unlinking text in table</a>.</li>
<li>A nested widget selection handle is no longer <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9491">visible while the outer table cells are selected</a>.</li>
<li>The HTML embed UI does now <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10182">correctly reflects the read-only state</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Read more in the blog post: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v31.0.0-with-enhanced-restricted-modes-handling-and-new-collaboration-samples/" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v31.0.0-with-enhanced-restricted-modes-handling-and-new-collaboration-samples/</a></p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-1" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-1"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MAJOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-embed" rel="nofollow">html-embed</a></strong>: The <code>InsertHtmlEmbedCommand</code> and <code>UpdateHtmlEmbedCommand</code> have been replaced by <code>HtmlEmbedCommand</code> which is now responsible for both tasks. The command can be executed via <code>editor.execute( 'htmlEmbed' )</code>. See the API reference for more information.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-features-2" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#features-2"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Features</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-core" rel="nofollow">core</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>Command#affectsData</code> flag to indicate whether a given command should stay enabled in editor modes with restricted write permissions (e.g. read-only mode). Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10670">#10670</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ad66b93212c72135f8b784b8f92dbbe213608d47">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The <code>DataController#get()</code> is now decorated and fires a <code>get</code> event on the method call. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10505">#10505</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/971763cbcb3ef5942068ab20302ed2355194bdee">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-mention" rel="nofollow">mention</a></strong>: Added the configuration option for customizing the maximum number of items in the list after typing the trigger character. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10479">#10479</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/7274202834cc89cae14193397d3d343a8d7d5b64">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-real-time-collaboration" rel="nofollow">real-time-collaboration</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>RealTimeCollaborationClient#serverHistory</code> property. See the API reference for more information.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-bug-fixes-2" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bug-fixes-2"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Bug fixes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-comments" rel="nofollow">comments</a></strong>: Features that do not change the content, should work properly in editor modes with restricted write permissions (e.g. read-only mode). See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10670">ckeditor/ckeditor5#10670</a>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-comments" rel="nofollow">comments</a></strong>: The comment data was not updated on remote clients after the local client edited the comment.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: DOM selection updates in <code>Renderer</code> when the selection is made using the mouse was blocked. Random glitching in Chrome when the user starts selection in a link (or a marker) at the beginning of the block was limited. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10562">#10562</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ad11de7551a0c8fff10adeb2117fb5743b9881f2">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Makes order of markers in downcast data pipeline consistent. Thanks <a href="https://github.com/bendemboski">@bendemboski</a>! Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10650">#10650</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5cd38c061e0d853149747735b9627f1f50fc492b">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Fixed a bug in the selection post-fixer (when the selection is stuck in a limit element that cannot contain text). Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10487">#10487</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ee98090cd8d46fe58821677d5a0a9f38c776078f">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-export-pdf" rel="nofollow">export-pdf</a></strong>: Features that do not change the content should work properly in editor modes with restricted write permissions (e.g. read-only mode). See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10670">ckeditor/ckeditor5#10670</a>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-find-and-replace" rel="nofollow">find-and-replace</a></strong>: The <code>FindCommand</code> and <code>FindNextCommand</code> commands should work properly in editor modes with restricted write permissions (e.g. read-only mode). Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10636">#10636</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ad66b93212c72135f8b784b8f92dbbe213608d47">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-find-and-replace" rel="nofollow">find-and-replace</a></strong>: Do not replace find results removed by collaborators that landed in the <code>$graveyard</code> root. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/a96e165b0ca6b39981400692ac5b0a86a28aef3e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-embed" rel="nofollow">html-embed</a></strong>: Embed buttons should reflect the read-only state of the editor and the HTML embed command. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10182">#10182</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/17aaadd2ee6de562e57e0336c347e32c27a29970">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-support" rel="nofollow">html-support</a></strong>: Adds HTML support for all headings given in the configuration of the headings feature. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10539">#10539</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/64903114569cbc995c0fc57bdd2b13f402b1f978">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-mention" rel="nofollow">mention</a></strong>: Th mention panel will now hide when the editor becomes read-only. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/4645">#4645</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/96d423adbcd4e716b8666af41d02d3b7e79f2f17">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-restricted-editing" rel="nofollow">restricted-editing</a></strong>: The feature should work properly in editor modes with restricted write permissions (e.g. read-only mode). Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10634">#10634</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ad66b93212c72135f8b784b8f92dbbe213608d47">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-select-all" rel="nofollow">select-all</a></strong>: The <code>SelectAllCommand</code> command should work properly in editor modes with restricted write permissions (e.g. read-only mode). Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10635">#10635</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ad66b93212c72135f8b784b8f92dbbe213608d47">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-source-editing" rel="nofollow">source-editing</a></strong>: Calling <code>editor.getData()</code> while in the source editing mode should return the data from the source editor passed through the model. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10505">#10505</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/971763cbcb3ef5942068ab20302ed2355194bdee">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-source-editing" rel="nofollow">source-editing</a></strong>: Improve source editing textarea field size and scrolling behaviour. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10422">#10422</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/3decb16dec6581a2c006576f46f7a30b4ab96535">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-source-editing" rel="nofollow">source-editing</a></strong>: Safari browser uses monospace font for text in source editing mode. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10585">#10585</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/d30e516fb5a348f22be57375d7a8460d0f54fd07">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The <code>SelectColumnCommand</code> and <code>SelectRowCommand</code> commands should work properly in editor modes with restricted write permissions (e.g. read-only mode). See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10635">#10635</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ad66b93212c72135f8b784b8f92dbbe213608d47">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Color dropdown buttons in the table properties form should not be misaligned in Safari. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10589">#10589</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/82dbfba48493573ab32829b64a36591d2965e357">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: A nested widget in a multi-cell table selection should not have the selection handle. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9491">#9491</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/80e520de904a0b7d7943f0c2d73244d9a608db68">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: The <code>ContextualBalloon</code> positioning should use the dynamic <code>editor.ui.viewportOffset</code> value instead of static <code>config.ui.viewportOffset</code>. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10597">#10597</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/6ab963cff6356adefef9f987bed7fe5edf4ac76d">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: The <code>InputTextView</code> class should update its <code>#isEmpty</code> property on every <code>#input</code> instead of <code>#change</code> to stay in sync. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10431">#10431</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/f5f65d3e93d136bfec3435678331b2c00cc74318">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-utils" rel="nofollow">utils</a></strong>: Properly stringify objects containing circular references in the <code>CKEditorError</code> class. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/4959">#4959</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/674114303fb7ad58ea8356e014db804e59e97d41">commit</a>) Thanks to <a href="https://github.com/marcellofuschi">@marcellofuschi</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-other-changes-2" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#other-changes-2"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Other changes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-code-block" rel="nofollow">code-block</a></strong>: Makes three <kbd>Enter</kbd> clicks necessary at the end of a code block to escape it. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6682">#6682</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ba7dedbd8ba21a9127a8451057232db72e41d964">commit</a>) Thanks to <a href="https://github.com/marcellofuschi">@marcellofuschi</a>!</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-comments" rel="nofollow">comments</a></strong>: Allowed annotations not to belong to any UI (annotation will be hidden in such a case).</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-comments" rel="nofollow">comments</a></strong>: Refined the comment icon for consistency with other icons in the project.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Implemented the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_engine_view_domconverter-DomConverter.html#function-setContentOf" rel="nofollow"><code>DomConverter#setContentOf()</code></a> method to fill DOM elements with a filtered HTML source. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/7bf8717f2f5b1a60ca53fbc5b62a9cbda13dc484">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Made properties of <code>XmlDataProcessor</code> and <code>HtmlDataProcessor</code> public to allow overriding e.g. the HTML writer. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10619">#10619</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b097349f5063b4f9b4822419e2d5c6663dd48aa0">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Introduced alternative rendering mode to <code>DomConverter</code>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/39d5cb676c89045fe80fa4a5425fac3d08280c72">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Introduced flag for experimental rendering mode for the editing view. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/13f788a4c20ecc46bd5ef6b4e37e5970f0573fd3">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-export-word" rel="nofollow">export-word</a></strong>: Refined the Export to Word icon for better discoverability.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-support" rel="nofollow">html-support</a></strong>: Optimized the editing pipeline output of the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_html-support_converters.html#function-createObjectView" rel="nofollow"><code>createObjectView()</code></a> view factory function. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/7bf8717f2f5b1a60ca53fbc5b62a9cbda13dc484">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-support" rel="nofollow">html-support</a></strong>: Enable experimental rendering in tests. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/13f788a4c20ecc46bd5ef6b4e37e5970f0573fd3">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-media-embed" rel="nofollow">media-embed</a></strong>: Optimized the editing pipeline output of the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_media-embed_mediaregistry-Media.html#function-getViewElement" rel="nofollow"><code>Media#getViewElement()</code></a> view factory method. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/7bf8717f2f5b1a60ca53fbc5b62a9cbda13dc484">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Updated translations. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ee01cf567145f394bd7007196e832c15b408163d">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Updated dependencies.</li>
</ul>

<h2 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-3000-2021-09-27" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#3000-2021-09-27"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/compare/v29.2.0...v30.0.0">30.0.0</a> (2021-09-27)</h2>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-release-highlights-3" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#release-highlights-3"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Release highlights</h3>
<p dir="auto">We are happy to announce the release of CKEditor 5 v30.0.0.</p>
<p dir="auto">This release introduces the following new features:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10413">Allow reverting text transformations by pressing <kbd>Backspace</kbd></a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10302">Cut down the search time in the Find &amp; replace feature</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">There were also a few bug fixes:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>Fixed <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10383">invalid cell property after pasting a table to the editor from Word</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9892">The table toolbar now respects the <code>viewportTopOffset</code> configuration</a>.</li>
<li>Automatic text transformation: <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9170">the dates get no longer turn into fractions</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10420">The toolbar no longer loses focus</a> after escaping from the find and replace dropdown.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Read more in the blog post: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v30.0.0-with-better-handling-of-automated-actions-and-plugin-development-tool/" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v30.0.0-with-better-handling-of-automated-actions-and-plugin-development-tool/</a></p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-2" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-2"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MAJOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>The <code>config.toolbar.viewportTopOffset</code> property was moved to <code>config.ui.viewportOffset</code> and it now accepts an object.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-2" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-2"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MINOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The <code>Matcher</code> class is more strict in handling <code>Element</code>s provided to the <code>match()</code> and <code>matchAll()</code> methods. It will not accept other <code>Node</code>s now.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-support" rel="nofollow">html-support</a></strong>: The public helper function <code>html-support/converters~disallowedAttributesConverter</code> has been removed due to a change in the approach to filtering disallowed elements and attributes.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: The <code>centeredBalloonPositionForLongWidgets()</code> helper was removed from widget utils. Use <code>BalloonPanelView.defaultPositions.viewportStickyNorth</code> instead. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9892">#9892</a>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: <code>toWidgetEditable()</code> will now set highlight handling for the editable element. If you used this method in conversion in your custom plugin it may affect your element styling when there is a marker on that element (e.g. a comment or a suggestion).</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-features-3" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#features-3"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Features</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-autoformat" rel="nofollow">autoformat</a></strong>: Allowed reverting the automatic <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/features/autoformat.html" rel="nofollow">Markdown-like formatting</a> by pressing <kbd>Backspace</kbd>. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10413">#10413</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b46ae90ceac64662784a5a450190bf549b482a79">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-support" rel="nofollow">html-support</a></strong>: Added the General HTML Support integration for the image feature. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9916">#9916</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/68796d986c4a7eb1c1581e29d05a25cd24f20ce0">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Allowed using backspace to undo automatic the image insertion transformations. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10413">#10413</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/66073dd93b7666a91feb491550e06a438d80e1ec">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: Introduced a new position type (<code>viewportStickyNorth</code>) in <code>BalloonPanelView.defaultPositions</code>. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9892">#9892</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/00c7cfd149a6f3637d1536e8be6dc6ed18bf1652">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Introduced the <code>editor.ui.viewportOffset</code> property, which allows modifying the viewport's offset in runtime. This value is used by the editor e.g. to position its sticky toolbar and contextual balloons. Additionally, the <code>config.toolbar.viewportTopOffset</code> property was moved to <code>config.ui.viewportOffset</code> and it now accepts an object. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9672">#9672</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/f8297dfd04c40ac6638142cca0fc25ffd953288e">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-bug-fixes-3" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bug-fixes-3"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Bug fixes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Added system colors names from the CSS Color Module Level 3 so that pasting tables from MS Word works correctly. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10383">#10383</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8961911324d1bae90175e4221cc0506e78da5796">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Fixed the <code>Matcher</code> class handling global flag in the <code>RegExp</code>s patterns. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10282">#10282</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/3e9e357eeb950b955d3c739290bdd569d3d765d4">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-find-and-replace" rel="nofollow">find-and-replace</a></strong>: The toolbar should not lose focus after escaping from the find and replace dropdown. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10420">#10420</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/a5e0392d24d98091b05d419515071622f51b093c">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-find-and-replace" rel="nofollow">find-and-replace</a></strong>: Improved the performance of the find feature by reducing the number of <code>model.change()</code> calls. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10302">#10302</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8d425ed35cea7a1dcfb1792a7a3822b1e1dec875">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Attributes from a marker conversion descriptor will now be correctly added on view elements during marker downcast. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10425">#10425</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/7951f7994263bf73d47a5796a610fe82f05d9abe">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Fixed widget highlight in the revision comparison in some cases with nested edits added by different users.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Made reordering table rows and columns possible without breaking the view in tables with heading rows or heading columns. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10463">#10463</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/12a24f853286f6e44cead98b2bee6703ad6013a9">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Cancelling the table cell properties UI no longer results with a warning in the console. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6266">#6266</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/a312aaaff2b3feaef3ed0ba8bcad8ec3d0fa9b25">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Fixed handling of a non-collapsed selection inside a table cell. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10391">#10391</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/487d5444e72718725dbbf64b14af42dbd6b996a9">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-track-changes" rel="nofollow">track-changes</a></strong>: Fixed crash happening in some scenarios in track changes mode after an image element split a non-paragraph element.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-track-changes" rel="nofollow">track-changes</a></strong>: Fixed missing data-suggestion attributes on table cells and image captions.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-typing" rel="nofollow">typing</a></strong>: Restricted mathematical text transformation, so that it requires no alphanumeric character before and after the fraction. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9170">#9170</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/e228a7e1ff024295ba090db553de2f3561845814">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: The editor no longer crashes when a button has <code>withKeystroke</code> set to <code>true</code> but no <code>keystroke</code> property is provided. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9412">#9412</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/3e4cb49701928cec988cd40ba33747ee912747fd">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: Fixed arrow keys navigation when there is an inline widget at the edge of a table cell. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9380">#9380</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/487d5444e72718725dbbf64b14af42dbd6b996a9">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
