<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The <code>MarkerCollection#has()</code> method now also accepts an instance of a marker. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9985">#9985</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/bf3699f4824ca797c7e3a847e921eb99db9f4ad7">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Upcast images with or without the empty <code>src</code> attribute. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9238">#9238</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/50e457758592b8d10c737783762573f1290a9536">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Prevent leaving an unconsumed <code>figure</code> element after conversion. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/68796d986c4a7eb1c1581e29d05a25cd24f20ce0">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Upcast linked images with or without the empty <code>src</code> attribute. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9238">#9238</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/50e457758592b8d10c737783762573f1290a9536">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-media" rel="nofollow">media</a></strong>: The <code>figure</code> element should not be consumed if the media embed is unknown. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/50e457758592b8d10c737783762573f1290a9536">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-media-embed" rel="nofollow">media-embed</a></strong>: Prevent leaving an unconsumed <code>figure</code> element after conversion. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/68796d986c4a7eb1c1581e29d05a25cd24f20ce0">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: <code>toWidgetEditable()</code> will now set the default highlight handling for the editable element. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/7951f7994263bf73d47a5796a610fe82f05d9abe">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: <code>setHighlightHandling()</code> received default parameters for the highlight add and remove functions which handle classes and attributes. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/7951f7994263bf73d47a5796a610fe82f05d9abe">commit</a>)</li>
<li>The viewport offsets will be taken into consideration when calculating the position of contextual balloons (such as the table toolbar). Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9892">#9892</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/00c7cfd149a6f3637d1536e8be6dc6ed18bf1652">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Updated translations. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/673672080d81ff5b8936021a4723784a59823576">commit</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/fb58634b7fd138297f55ac5424e6a26d9cca3cda">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>

<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-release-highlights-4" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#release-highlights-4"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Release highlights</h3>
<p dir="auto">We are happy to announce the release of CKEditor 5 v29.2.0.</p>
<p dir="auto">This release introduces several new features:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10229">Redesigned find and replace panel</a> and a few improvements to the feature itself.</li>
<li>The possibility to create a localized editor when using <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/builds/guides/development/dll-builds.html" rel="nofollow">DLL builds</a>.</li>
<li>Improved performance when <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10287">pasting large images</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">There were also a few bug fixes:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>Switching to source editing no longer <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10180">scrolls to the end of the content</a>.</li>
<li>The highlight feature <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/2616">can now be used while typing</a>.</li>
<li>Pasted HTML comments <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10213">are filtered out</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Read more in the blog post: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v29.2.0-with-redesigned-find-and-replace-and-localized-dll-builds/" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v29.2.0-with-redesigned-find-and-replace-and-localized-dll-builds/</a></p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-3" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-3"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MINOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-find-and-replace" rel="nofollow">find-and-replace</a></strong>: The layout, styling, and view structure of the find and replace form have changed radically, which may affect integrations that either customized or extended this form (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10229">#10229</a>).</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: The revision data now includes a new property: <code>authorsIds</code>. This property needs to be handled (saved and loaded) similarly to other revision properties. For revisions that are already saved in your database, set this value to an array with one string, equal to the <code>creatorId</code> value (e.g. <code>["user1"]</code>). Check the updated <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/features/revision-history/revision-history-integration.html" rel="nofollow">revision history integration guide</a> to see an example.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: The documentation for revision history adapter has been updated. Please check the <code>RevisionHistoryAdapter#addRevision()</code> and <code>updateRevision()</code> documentation to make sure that you correctly handle all the data passed to these methods.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-features-4" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#features-4"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Features</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-core" rel="nofollow">core</a></strong>: Added the "cog" icon to the core icon set (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10229">#10229</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/dc3160944d6d0c95469e982a47936d47aa1bbd64">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-find-and-replace" rel="nofollow">find-and-replace</a></strong>: Made it possible to cycle find results by using <kbd>Enter</kbd> and <kbd>Shift</kbd>+<kbd>Enter</kbd> keystrokes. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10012">#10012</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/fe554b9a706e22cb91e19356ca461897af7e0e04">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-support" rel="nofollow">html-support</a></strong>: Added general HTML support integration for the media embed feature. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9918">#9918</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ec4d39dc5daa10833d6690834f7aee4c0b734169">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-mention" rel="nofollow">mention</a></strong>: Keyboard shortcuts to accept mentions can be customized using the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_mention_mention-MentionConfig.html#member-commitKeys" rel="nofollow"><code>config.mention.commitKeys</code></a> configuration option. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/4665">#4665</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/9fa1052f5fed9111d9534047a573e9c311dc9516">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-bug-fixes-4" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bug-fixes-4"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Bug fixes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-comments" rel="nofollow">comments</a></strong>: The <code>Comment#setAttribute()</code> and <code>Comment#removeAttribute()</code> methods will now correctly set the attribute value and fire the adapter call also for comments created by other users.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-find-and-replace" rel="nofollow">find-and-replace</a></strong>: Changing the search text should reset the results. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10304">#10304</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/dc3160944d6d0c95469e982a47936d47aa1bbd64">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-find-and-replace" rel="nofollow">find-and-replace</a></strong>: Toggling search options should reset the results. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10021">#10021</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/dc3160944d6d0c95469e982a47936d47aa1bbd64">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-find-and-replace" rel="nofollow">find-and-replace</a></strong>: The find and replace form should be responsive. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10019">#10019</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/dc3160944d6d0c95469e982a47936d47aa1bbd64">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-find-and-replace" rel="nofollow">find-and-replace</a></strong>: The search term should be allowed to contain a trailing or leading space when searching "whole words only". Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10131">#10131</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/fd9dfa7658e7ee3e968612274294baf224828326">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-support" rel="nofollow">html-support</a></strong>: All pasted HTML comments will now be filtered. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10213">#10213</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/59e23271a9ed32fb7bdc4eb51360b5e0f5d7b0ba">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-support" rel="nofollow">html-support</a></strong>: Extended the schema definition for <code>$root</code> to allow storing a comment's content as the <code>$root</code> attribute. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10274">#10274</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/35b08a96f41423b1e1173af60c186fb0193c92cb">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Enabled multiple authors in one revision. Introduced the <code>authorsIds</code> property in the revision data.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Visual improvements to how nested changes are displayed.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-source-editing" rel="nofollow">source-editing</a></strong>: The selection is now set to the beginning of the source editing view. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10180">#10180</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/1e5b03d8a91038dfcf4a7afc7a47f11cb7a27041">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-source-editing" rel="nofollow">source-editing</a></strong>: The source editing feature will send a warning to the console when the restricted editing feature is loaded. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10228">#10228</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/42a31c423c1b770e7a25d3dbb546fc1327100779">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-theme-lark" rel="nofollow">theme-lark</a></strong>: The label of the labeled field should stay at the top when the field is disabled and not empty to not cover the field's text (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10229">#10229</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/dc3160944d6d0c95469e982a47936d47aa1bbd64">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-other-changes-4" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#other-changes-4"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Other changes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/ckeditor5" rel="nofollow">ckeditor5</a></strong>: The <code>ckeditor5</code> package offers translation files for several core CKEditor 5 packages: <code>utils</code>, <code>core</code>, <code>engine</code>, <code>ui</code>, <code>clipboard</code>, <code>enter</code>, <code>paragraph</code>, <code>select-all</code>, <code>typing</code>, <code>undo</code>, <code>upload</code>, and <code>widget</code>, used in the DLL builds. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/40574471b7b4aeaeb73b8b945fb3b38557eef19a">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-clipboard" rel="nofollow">clipboard</a></strong>: The <code>DataTransfer.files</code> property is not evaluated more than once. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10287">#10287</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/2bde3d069ead725d8fc2f6e7379da05523c29fde">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-comments" rel="nofollow">comments</a></strong>: Raised comments character limit to 65000.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-core" rel="nofollow">core</a></strong>: Merged a duplicated translation context from <code>ckeditor5-ui</code> and <code>ckeditor5-find-and-replace</code> packages. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10400">#10400</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/f931085112d9f8cdeb731543a01729058c7e3ce6">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-find-and-replace" rel="nofollow">find-and-replace</a></strong>: Moved the search result translation context to <code>ckeditor5-core</code>. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10400">#10400</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/f931085112d9f8cdeb731543a01729058c7e3ce6">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-find-and-replace" rel="nofollow">find-and-replace</a></strong>: Visually revamped the find and replace form. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10229">#10229</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/dc3160944d6d0c95469e982a47936d47aa1bbd64">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-find-and-replace" rel="nofollow">find-and-replace</a></strong>: Increased the contrast between selected and unselected find and replace results. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10242">#10242</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/f5a2c57aa7b2aeea5a01ad1e7c7bf0a9b9118078">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-highlight" rel="nofollow">highlight</a></strong>: Toggling highlight does not remove it when the caret is at the end of the highlighted range. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/2616">#2616</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/d1a271d127777bb0f33f0e4e52222f0fbf21f6c2">commit</a>)</li>

<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-theme-lark" rel="nofollow">theme-lark</a></strong>: Moved the presentational find and replace form styles to the theme (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10229">#10229</a>). <li>Updated translations. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/d88cc7e93d4fbb0ad4f68943cff55d37532ec2cb">commit</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/70bd66b567f19450717ed69ce999521e5c4aa26e">commit</a>)</li>
<li>The content styles stylesheet for the guide will now be generated on-demand using the <code>{@exec...}</code> feature. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10299">#10299</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/18123a72726a2f9f052189b89ec58218603d26da">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>

<h2 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-2910-2021-08-02" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#2910-2021-08-02"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/compare/v29.0.0...v29.1.0">29.1.0</a> (2021-08-02)</h2>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-release-highlights-5" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#release-highlights-5"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Release highlights</h3>
<p dir="auto">We are happy to announce the release of CKEditor 5 v29.1.0.</p>
<p dir="auto">This release introduces several new features:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>The <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10079">content minimap</a> feature which aids document navigation. <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/document-navigation-made-easy-previewing-the-content-minimap-in-ckeditor-5/" rel="nofollow"><strong>Read more about the minimap</strong></a>.</li>
<li>Support for <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8822">HTML comments</a>.</li>
<li>Integration with the autosave feature in revision history.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10039">Possibility to enforce tables to contain a header row by default</a>.</li>
<li>Several improvements in the <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10024">find and replace</a> feature.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">There were also a few bug fixes:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>The code block added with autoformatting <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10005">will now remember the language</a> of the previously inserted block.</li>
<li>Problems with pasting lists from Word have been eliminated (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9055">#9055</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9954">#9954</a>).</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Read more in the blog post: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v29.1.0-with-content-minimap-html-comments-and-revision-history-autosave/" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v29.1.0-with-content-minimap-html-comments-and-revision-history-autosave/</a>.</p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-4" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-4"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MINOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-embed" rel="nofollow">html-embed</a></strong>: The preview content will not be centered anymore.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Several conversion helpers have been renamed and removed from the public API:
<ul dir="auto">
<li><code>viewFigureToModel() -&gt; upcastImageFigure()</code>,</li>
<li><code>srcsetAttributeConverter() -&gt; downcastSrcsetAttribute()</code>,</li>
<li><code>modelToViewAttributeConverter() -&gt; downcastImageAttribute()</code>.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: <code>RevisionTracker#saveRevision()</code> was renamed to <code>RevisionTracker#updateRevision()</code>. This is to better reflect what the method actually does. Since revision locking was introduced, <code>saveRevision( { name: ... } )</code> calls should be replaced with <code>updateRevision( { name: ..., isLocked: true } )</code> calls.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: The <code>Revision#name</code> property is now read-only. You need to use <code>Revision#setName()</code> instead.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-features-5" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#features-5"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Features</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-autosave" rel="nofollow">autosave</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>Autosave#save()</code> function. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10215">#10215</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/7be280fbe0514ef9000ad13619bf43a17ce92302">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Introduced the new (<code>skipComments</code>) option in <code>DomConverter#domToView()</code> (<code>false</code> by default) to make it possible to decide whether HTML comments should be removed from the data. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/023b4eacf29a57e653e1171c15019ae0b8b33f8b">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-support" rel="nofollow">html-support</a></strong>: Introduced the HTML comment plugin. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8822">#8822</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/023b4eacf29a57e653e1171c15019ae0b8b33f8b">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-support" rel="nofollow">html-support</a></strong>: Added support for elements that can act both as a paragraph and a sectioning element depending on the content context. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10085">#10085</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/30a93834720bb391b23d54b6aa73c5babd5a89c7">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-support" rel="nofollow">html-support</a></strong>: Added General HTML Support integration for the table feature. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9914">#9914</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/95416915e3bea9053356c38f4c9eccd95868855f">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Implemented the <code>&lt;picture&gt;</code> element support in the image feature. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9833">#9833</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/9a265d1cbb7f5c9e9f0750da24d7afcfb56d3474">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-minimap" rel="nofollow">minimap</a></strong>: Basic implementation of the content minimap feature. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10079">#10079</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/7bb5b2e05e0ecc05f106ab5dd2d39420920b01aa">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Introduced the possibility to update a revision after it was created. Provided a way to integrate revision history with the autosave plugin. See the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/features/revision-history/revision-history.html" rel="nofollow">revision history</a> guide.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>Revision#setName()</code> function. <code>Revision#name</code> is now read-only.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Introduced several properties: <code>Revision#isLocked</code>, <code>Revision#lock()</code> and <code>RevisionTracker#isLocked</code>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Introduced an editor configuration option allowing to set default headings for newly created tables. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10039">#10039</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/f2a838a80f821f40a9e24160f8e4e8a2d1ca096e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-track-changes" rel="nofollow">track-changes</a></strong>: Enabled export to Word in track changes mode.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-bug-fixes-5" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bug-fixes-5"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Bug fixes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-autoformat" rel="nofollow">autoformat</a></strong>: Autoformat will apply the previous language choice for the code block feature. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10005">#10005</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/cc3dd760c2b8150de6e954ea89c7f713c135847a">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-autosave" rel="nofollow">autosave</a></strong>: Autosave callback should not be called while the editor is initialized. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10214">#10214</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/7be280fbe0514ef9000ad13619bf43a17ce92302">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-build-decoupled-document" rel="nofollow">build-decoupled-document</a></strong>: The editing area in the sample should have a solid white background. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10095">#10095</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/3d35544f3040bf0f022b014bd6d5bfb631c9739e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-collaboration-core" rel="nofollow">collaboration-core</a></strong>: User initials for user names longer than two word will now be composed of the first letters of the first and last word of the name. This is better for names with a middle name or with a last name having a prefix.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: White spaces around inline object elements such as <code>&lt;img&gt;</code> or <code>&lt;button&gt;</code> should not be lost in the data. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10147">#10147</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/90c64dc98514e8b95a46639df7102b990ea8c22f">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Matcher should not match the style and class attributes with the object <code>attributes</code> pattern. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9813">#9813</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/287e04574d7b662d8d051cd12975e5ef871ff6df">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-find-and-replace" rel="nofollow">find-and-replace</a></strong>: Find and replace feature now works correctly with a multi-root editor. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10146">#10146</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b7b31240ecd638cb97b9e6fa71e426fe255d1a5b">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Link decorators should use class and style properties instead of directly matching style and class HTML attributes. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9813">#9813</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/287e04574d7b662d8d051cd12975e5ef871ff6df">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-paste-from-office" rel="nofollow">paste-from-office</a></strong>: Fixed a crash when pasting lists from Word to the editor. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9055">#9055</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9954">#9954</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/2aec072956aef78ac7360e60f2be6db884e70d83">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: The <code>Autosave</code> plugin now will be filtered by <code>RevisionHistory</code> plugin, so it will not be included in the revision history view editor instance as this caused errors.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Tables will be now correctly handled after a change in a table was undone.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Fixed model mappings in a table cell if a paragraph is bound to its parent. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/023b4eacf29a57e653e1171c15019ae0b8b33f8b">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Fixed editor freezing when providing invalid <code>colspan</code> or <code>rowspan</code> attribute values. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10042">#10042</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b03810496363212511768b698ec09e50c00698e8">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-track-changes" rel="nofollow">track-changes</a></strong>: The <code>Autosave</code> plugin will no longer cause editor crashes when used together with the <code>TrackChangesData</code> plugin.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: Remove references to and destroy resizers of widgets no longer in the document. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10156">#10156</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/f177ad1e1c2562d5ca93fb5aa6e24f3d10c3ae49">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: The editor should not crash when a widget with a resizer is moved in the model document. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10266">#10266</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/01e830f140e212f81319a5b1ef10d3562d9f73aa">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-other-changes-5" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#other-changes-5"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Other changes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The <code>elementToMarker()</code> upcast helper is no longer marked as deprecated. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/023b4eacf29a57e653e1171c15019ae0b8b33f8b">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-export-word" rel="nofollow">export-word</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>config.exportWord.dataCallback</code> option to define a custom data provider for conversion. This brings support for multi-root editors.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-embed" rel="nofollow">html-embed</a></strong>: The preview content for the HTML embed plugin will not be centered. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9486">#9486</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8bfb0c2cdecb09688b852b0f88f6401cfdc881b1">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: <code>RevisionTracker#saveRevision()</code> was renamed to <code>RevisionTracker#updateRevision()</code>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Revision will be updated (or an autosave callback will be fired) when the revision history view is opened. This replaces the temporary "Unsaved changes" revision.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Restoring an unnamed revision will now create a revision with a name containing the restored revision's date.</li>
<li>Updated translations. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/49689be964b307c3cc896031283b717f972408ec">commit</a>)</li>
<li>The <code>ckeditor5-metadata.json</code> file will be published on npm along with the package's code. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/10004">ckeditor/ckeditor5#10004</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/bbaf0b43785ba221d14668368865de2e247886f9">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>

<h2 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-2900-2021-07-05" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#2900-2021-07-05"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/compare/v28.0.0...v29.0.0">29.0.0</a> (2021-07-05)</h2>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-release-highlights-6" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#release-highlights-6"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Release highlights</h3>
<p dir="auto">We are happy to announce the release of CKEditor 5 v29.0.0.</p>
<p dir="auto">This release introduces several new features:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>Support for <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/2052">inline images</a> in the image feature, allowing to insert multiple images in a single content block.</li>
<li>The <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/1430">find and replace</a> feature.</li>
<li>The <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9647">source editing</a> feature for classic editor with the ability to directly edit the HTML or Markdown content.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8722">Remembering the language when creating a new code block</a>.</li>
<li>The experimental <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9970">General HTML Support</a> feature that allows enabling HTML features that are not explicitly supported by any other dedicated CKEditor 5 plugins.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">There were also a few bug fixes:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>The remove format feature will not <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9684">reset the image size anymore</a></li>
<li>Nested marker highlight will not <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9513">break the mouse text selection</a></li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Read more in the blog post: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/CKEditor-5-v29.0.0-with-boosted-images-find-and-replace-and-the-source-editing-feature/" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/blog/CKEditor-5-v29.0.0-with-boosted-images-find-and-replace-and-the-source-editing-feature/</a>.</p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-3" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-3"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MAJOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-build-decoupled-document" rel="nofollow">build-decoupled-document</a></strong>: The official preconfigured <a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-build-decoupled-document" rel="nofollow">decoupled document build</a> now ships with the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_image_imageresize-ImageResize.html" rel="nofollow"><code>ImageResize</code></a> plugin enabled by default. Learn more about it in the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/builds/guides/migration/migration-to-29.html" rel="nofollow">Migration to v.29.x guide</a>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The <code>Image</code> plugin works as a glue for both the <code>ImageBlock</code> and <code>ImageInline</code> features now (previously it only supported block images). If you do not want inline images to be allowed, consider replacing the <code>Image</code> plugin with <code>ImageBlock</code> in your editor configuration. Otherwise, all images without the <code>&lt;figure&gt;</code> wrapper will be loaded into the editor content as inline images, which in some cases may affect content semantics and styling. Check the updated <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/features/images/images-installation.html" rel="nofollow">image installation guide</a> for more details about this change.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The <code>ImageEditing</code> plugin is no longer standalone, as the majority of its logic was extracted to the <code>ImageBlockEditing</code> and <code>ImageInlineEditing</code> plugins. The logic remaining in the <code>ImageEditing</code> is common for both <code>ImageBlockEditing</code> and <code>ImageInlineEditing</code> plugins.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The image caption is no longer displayed automatically when the user selects a block image. Instead, its presence is controlled using the <code>'toggleImageCaption'</code> toolbar button and a <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_image_imagecaption_toggleimagecaptioncommand-ToggleImageCaptionCommand.html" rel="nofollow"><code>ToggleImageCaptionCommand</code></a> for better integration with the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/builds/guides/migration/migration-to-29.html#image-styles" rel="nofollow">revamped image styles system</a>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The API of the image features has changed, please make sure to update your integrations.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The linked image indicator (icon) rendered as a <code>&lt;span&gt;</code> with the <code>.ck-link-image_icon</code> CSS class has been removed. To alter the look of the indicator (including the icon), please use the <code>figure.image &gt; a::after</code> (for linked block images) and <code>a span.image-inline::after</code> (for linked inline images) CSS selectors instead.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_image_image_converters.html#function-srcsetAttributeConverter" rel="nofollow"><code>srcsetAttributeConverter()</code></a> and <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_image_image_converters.html#function-modelToViewAttributeConverter" rel="nofollow"><code>modelToViewAttributeConverter()</code></a> conversion helpers now require the <code>imageType</code> parameter.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The in-cell pseudo-paragraph used for data tables is no longer styled using the inline <code>style</code> attribute but a <code>.ck-table-bogus-paragraph</code> CSS class instead.</li>
<li>Several plugins are not loaded automatically as dependencies of other plugins anymore. From now on, they need to be provided by the editor creator manually (via the <code>config.plugins</code> configuration option). Learn more about it in the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/builds/guides/migration/migration-to-29.html" rel="nofollow">Migration to v.29.0.0 guide</a>. This list includes:
<ul dir="auto">
<li>The <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_ckfinder_ckfinder-CKFinder.html" rel="nofollow"><code>CKFinder</code></a> plugin is no longer automatically importing the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_image_image-Image.html" rel="nofollow"><code>Image</code></a> plugin as a dependency.</li>
<li>The <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_easy-image_easyimage-EasyImage.html" rel="nofollow"><code>EasyImage</code></a> plugin is no longer automatically importing the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_image_image-Image.html" rel="nofollow"><code>Image</code></a> plugin as a dependency.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Several functions are no longer a part of the public API. This list includes:
<ul dir="auto">
<li><code>getSelectedImageWidget()</code></li>
<li><code>getViewImgFromWidget()</code></li>
<li><code>isImageAllowed()</code></li>
<li><code>isImage()</code></li>
<li><code>isImageWidget()</code></li>
<li><code>toImageWidget()</code></li>
<li><code>captionElementCreator()</code></li>
<li><code>isCaption()</code></li>
<li><code>checkSelectionOnObject()</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Several functions or constants have been renamed. The list of changes includes:
<ul dir="auto">
<li>The <code>getCaptionFromImage()</code> helper is now available as <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_image_imagecaption_utils.html#function-getCaptionFromImageModelElement" rel="nofollow"><code>getCaptionFromImageModelElement()</code></a>.</li>
<li>The <code>matchImageCaption()</code> helper is now available as <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_image_imagecaption_utils.html#function-matchImageCaptionViewElement" rel="nofollow"><code>matchImageCaptionViewElement()</code></a>.</li>
<li>The <code>defaultIcons</code> are now available as <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_image_imagestyle_utils.html#constant-DEFAULT_ICONS" rel="nofollow"><code>DEFAULT_ICONS</code></a>.</li>
<li>The <code>defaultStyles</code> are now available as <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_image_imagestyle_utils.html#constant-DEFAULT_OPTIONS" rel="nofollow"><code>DEFAULT_OPTIONS</code></a>.</li>
<li>The <code>findOptimalInsertionPosition()</code> helper is now <code>findOptimalInsertionRange()</code> and returns a <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_engine_model_range-Range.html" rel="nofollow">model range</a>. Also, instead of searching for a position next to the currently selected block, it will now attempt to replace that block (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9102">#9102</a>).</li>
<li>The <code>isImageAllowed()</code> helper is now available as <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_link_utils.html#function-isLinkableElement" rel="nofollow"><code>isLinkableElement()</code></a>.</li>
<li>Some helpers from the image utilities module (<code>@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image/src/image/utils.js</code>) have been moved to the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_image_imageutils-ImageUtils.html" rel="nofollow"><code>ImageUtils</code> plugin</a>. The helpers are still accessible via the <code>editor.plugins.get( 'ImageUtils' )</code> namespace, for instance, <code>editor.plugins.get( 'ImageUtils' ).insertImage( ... )</code>.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>The API of several functions or modules has been changed. Refer to the documentation to learn more. This list of changes includes:
<ul dir="auto">
<li>common <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_image_image_converters.html" rel="nofollow">image converters</a>,</li>
<li>various <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_image_imagecaption_utils.html" rel="nofollow">image caption utils</a>,</li>
<li>the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_image_imageutils-ImageUtils.html#function-insertImage" rel="nofollow"><code>insertImage()</code></a> helper,</li>
<li>the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_media-embed_utils.html#function-insertMedia" rel="nofollow"><code>insertMedia()</code></a> helper.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>The default user permissions have been changed. Now, by default, it is possible to remove other users' comment threads. This applies to non-real-time editing integrations and to real-time editing integrations using the writer role. This behavior can be changed using the <code>Permissions</code> plugin API (for non-real-time editing integrations) or by setting permissions for a given user in the user token (for integrations using CKEditor Cloud Services).</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-features-6" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#features-6"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Features</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-code-block" rel="nofollow">code-block</a></strong>: When inserting a new code block, instead of applying the default language (the first in the dropdown view), the feature now re-uses the language of the last inserted code block. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8722">#8722</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/a95554244e9fc71af5aa9e53c6841f114c6d2483">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-collaboration-core" rel="nofollow">collaboration-core</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>Permissions</code> plugin. Now it is possible to manage the editor's level of access using permissions. See the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/cs/latest/guides/security/roles.html" rel="nofollow">user roles and permissions</a> guide.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-comments" rel="nofollow">comments</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>CommentsRepository#isReadOnly()</code> method.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-comments" rel="nofollow">comments</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>CommentThread#isRemovable</code> property which is related to current permissions. By default, comment threads can now be removed by any user.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Improved engine view matcher with new pattern syntax allowing to match attribute keys using regular expressions. Unified the pattern syntax between attributes, styles, and classes. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9872">#9872</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/22fad3daaa7386da6a451e0dc60f4facf191bcaa">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Added the special <code>expand</code> option to the <code>StylesMap.getStyleNames()</code> and view <code>Element.getStyleNames()</code> methods allowing to expand shorthand style properties. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/22fad3daaa7386da6a451e0dc60f4facf191bcaa">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>batchType</code> option in <code>editor.data.set()</code> which can be used to preserve the undo/redo steps and to add an additional item to the undo stack. Note that it will still replace the whole content and should not be used with real-time collaboration. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/2b9ef7e7355d4fb18303aa857a4d6dbff5ff075f">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-support" rel="nofollow">html-support</a></strong>: Introduced the General HTML Support feature. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9970">#9970</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/a35db8593d099c609c7ce77450901016ea4aab38">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Introduced support for inline images in the editor content. Available out–of–the–box in all ready–to–use editor builds, inline images can be uploaded, styled, resized, and linked and complement the already supported block images. See the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/features/images/images-overview.html" rel="nofollow">image feature overview guide</a> to see inline images in action. For more information about breaking changes, migration path, and tips, check out the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/builds/guides/migration/migration-to-29.html" rel="nofollow">migration to v29.0.0</a> guide. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: It should now be possible to define the dropdown menu as an object in the <code>config.image.toolbar</code> configuration. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9340">#9340</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: The feature functionality now covers both block and inline images. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8871">#8871</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9017">#9017</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9167">#9167</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Enabled the Revision History feature in multi-root editors.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-source-editing" rel="nofollow">source-editing</a></strong>: Introduced the Source editing feature for the predefined classic editor build. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9647">#9647</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/2b9ef7e7355d4fb18303aa857a4d6dbff5ff075f">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-bug-fixes-6" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bug-fixes-6"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Bug fixes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-clipboard" rel="nofollow">clipboard</a></strong>:  All toolbars shall be hidden when the widget is dragged and shown back when the drag ends. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9566">#9566</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-code-block" rel="nofollow">code-block</a></strong>: The code block feature should not allow for inserting inline widgets as its content. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9567">#9567</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Fixed the downcast conversion of collapsed markers at the conversion range boundary. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8485">#8485</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/91d61dd0cfd85416883218039f8c2480b36711b7">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Added missing HTML block element names to the <code>DomConverter.blockElements</code> array. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9801">#9801</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7863">#7863</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/67b4c7d1f3724ae94fc15d1647ff793815fe1d1e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Markers should not be split in view on the caret position. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9513">#9513</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/be066b41aeb598588d281ffb6448f9df87477f61">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: <code>FocusObserver</code> should not force the view to render in random moments. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9513">#9513</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/be066b41aeb598588d281ffb6448f9df87477f61">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Disallowed inline images in the <code>caption</code> elements. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9794">#9794</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/d4afc64b03b1ce23bd391fe299b8d9ad4315e3fc">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The image should not resize to 100% if the resize command was overridden (canceled). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/1beed0357a8dd4c8bc05f44eb7108aab44685e51">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The side-aligned images should always have some <code>max-width</code> property to not take up the whole editor width. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9342">#9342</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The floating block images, except for the <code>side</code> images, should be displayed side by side by default. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9183">#9183</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: An image should never overflow the widget boundaries while changing its size. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9166">#9166</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The size label should be displayed above the image if it does not fit inside. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9166">#9166</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: An image caption placeholder text should not wrap or overflow. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9162">#9162</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: The link UI should be shown when clicking a linked inline widget. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9607">#9607</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-restricted-editing" rel="nofollow">restricted-editing</a></strong>: The editor will not crash when a restricted area marker is removed. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9650">#9650</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/f358e6d6faa66dce48d576cbd5fa4dfd15758bdb">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: The highlights for suggestions created in earlier revisions are now properly shown.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-revision-history" rel="nofollow">revision-history</a></strong>: Revision history will no longer crash if the table plugin has not been added to the editor.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: Selected inline widgets wrapped in an attribute in the view should create a fake selection. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9524">#9524</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9521">#9521</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-other-changes-6" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#other-changes-6"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Other changes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-build-decoupled-document" rel="nofollow">build-decoupled-document</a></strong>: The editor document build now includes the <code>ImageResize</code> plugin. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9507">#9507</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-comments" rel="nofollow">comments</a></strong>: The <code>Comment#isRemovable</code> property is now bound to <code>CommentThread#isRemovable</code>. <code>Comment#isRemovable</code> is set to <code>true</code> if the local user is the author, or if the comment thread is removable and the comment is the first comment in the thread.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-core" rel="nofollow">core</a></strong>: Added several new icons for new image styles (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8909">#8909</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-easy-image" rel="nofollow">easy-image</a></strong>: Removed the <code>Image</code> plugin dependency from the <code>EasyImage</code> plugin. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9399">#9399</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Fixed parsing leading HTML comments by <code>HtmlDataProcessor.toView()</code>. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9861">#9861</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/12dc7ba19490f155d494209f1987814d24f80048">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-horizontal-line" rel="nofollow">horizontal-line</a></strong>: New widgets will replace the selected block instead of being added next to it on insertion (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9102">#9102</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The default image style is now called <code>block</code>, instead of <code>full</code>. Its label now reads "Centered image" and it is represented by the appropriate icon in the image toolbar. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9545">#9545</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b5908e519b653fcfbd0c2a331e78d14167d4a81f">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Turned the image utilities module into an editor plugin to allow sharing utilities outside the package. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8871">#8871</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The image toolbar should be visible if the selection is placed inside an image caption. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9136">#9136</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The image caption should be controlled using the toolbar button and a command for a better integration with image styles. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8907">#8907</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-real-time-collaboration" rel="nofollow">real-time-collaboration</a></strong>: Made collaboration features compatible with inline images.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Added the <code>.ck-table-bogus-paragraph</code> CSS class to the in-cell pseudo-paragraph used for data tables for easier and safer styling. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: Added the <code>class</code> property to the <code>SplitButtonView</code> UI component. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8909">#8909</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: Safeguarded the way the <code>Widget</code> plugin sets the fake selection. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9580">#9580</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: Replaced the <code>findOptimalInsertionPosition()</code> helper with <code>findOptimalInsertionRange()</code> that will now attempt to replace selected blocks when inserting new widgets. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9102">#9102</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c228fb0549507f01d1f1ba4f9862817ac589279">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Optimized icons. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4ce9cf22a439427f61d0f5cb319665823a2aecf0">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Updated translations. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/196d308ade44197a7f3be68a7da897442ded55bc">commit</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/225cfd3b12386f2df9328bc2391397adc19f286f">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
