<h2 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-2800-2021-05-31" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#2800-2021-05-31"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/compare/v27.1.0...v28.0.0">28.0.0</a> (2021-05-31)</h2>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-release-highlights-7" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#release-highlights-7"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Release highlights</h3>
<p dir="auto">We are happy to announce the release of CKEditor 5 v28.0.0.</p>
<p dir="auto">This release introduces several new features:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>The <a href="https://ckeditor.com/ckeditor-5/revision-history/" rel="nofollow">Revision History</a> feature that allows the users to create, view and restore named content versions.</li>
<li>The possibility to <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/3204">add captions to tables</a>.</li>
<li>The ability to specify <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8502">the default properties for tables and table cells</a>.</li>
<li>The new <code>allowChildren</code> property for <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9261">the data schema item definition</a>.</li>
<li>The export to PDF and export to Word features are now <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7567">enabled in the read-only mode</a>.</li>
<li>The <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6642">plugin metadata</a> and the <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9401">complete documentation of the HTML output of all editor features</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">There were also a few bug fixes:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9474">Word can now properly open a file with nested tables exported from CKEditor 5</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9477">Pasting in the horizontal caret no longer replaces the widget</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9325">Correcting spelling in a list does not throw an error anymore</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5585">Toolbar navigation with the keyboard works in the right direction in a Right-to-Left text</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/2762">The media embed feature now supports more URL schemes for Google Maps</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Read more in the blog post: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/revision-history-is-officially-live-ckeditor-5-v28.0.0-released/" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/blog/revision-history-is-officially-live-ckeditor-5-v28.0.0-released/</a>.</p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-major-breaking-changes" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#major-breaking-changes"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MAJOR BREAKING CHANGES</h3>
<p dir="auto"><strong>Note:</strong> Check out the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/builds/guides/migration/migration-to-28.html" rel="nofollow">Migration to CKEditor 5 v28.0.0</a> guide for more detailed information on how to upgrade to the current version.</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>All the packages use multiple exports instead of one object in the <code>src/index.js</code> file. See the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/builds/guides/migration/migration-to-28.html#imports-from-index-files-of-non-dll-core-packages" rel="nofollow">list of affected packages</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-5" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-5"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MINOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Styles definitions for the <code>border:*</code> property produced by the styles processor will now be merged as a single <code>border:*</code> property if all its properties (width, style and color) for all edges (top, right, bottom, left) are the same.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The <code>TablePropertiesView</code> and <code>TableCellPropertiesView</code> classes require an additional property in the object as the second constructor argument (<code>options.defaultTableProperties</code> for the table and <code>options.defaultTableCellProperties</code> for table cells).</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The <code>upcastBorderStyles()</code> conversion helper requires a third argument called <code>defaultBorder</code>. The object defines the default border (<code>width</code>, <code>color</code>, <code>style</code>) properties.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The following conversion helpers: <code>upcastStyleToAttribute()</code>, <code>downcastAttributeToStyle()</code>, <code>downcastTableAttribute()</code> accept two arguments now (the conversion and the options objects). Previous usage: <code>conversionHelper( conversion, /* ... */ )</code> should be replaced with <code>conversionHelper( conversion, { /* ... */ } )</code>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Values for the <code>borderColor</code>, <code>borderStyle</code>, <code>borderWidth</code>, and <code>padding</code> model attributes are unified (to values produced by the editor itself) when upcasting the table or table cells if all sides (top, right, bottom and left) have the same values. Previously, the <code>&lt;table style="border: 1px solid #ff0"&gt;</code> element was upcasted to <code>&lt;table borderStyle="{"top":"solid","right":"solid","bottom":"solid","left":"solid"}" borderColor="{...}" borderWidth="{...}"&gt;</code>. Now the object will be replaced with the string value: <code>&lt;table borderStyle="solid" borderColor="#ff0" borderWidth="1px"&gt;</code>. The same structure is created when using the editor's toolbar. If border values are not identical, the object notation will be inserted into the model (as it is now).</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The following classes require the second argument called <code>defaultValue</code> which is the default value for the command:
<ul dir="auto">
<li><code>TableCellHorizontalAlignmentCommand</code>,</li>
<li><code>TableCellVerticalAlignmentCommand</code>,</li>
<li><code>TableCellBackgroundColorCommand</code>,</li>
<li><code>TableCellBorderColorCommand</code>,</li>
<li><code>TableCellBorderStyleCommand</code>,</li>
<li><code>TableCellBorderWidthCommand</code>,</li>
<li><code>TableCellHeightCommand</code>,</li>
<li><code>TableCellPropertyCommand</code>,</li>
<li><code>TableCellWidthCommand</code>,</li>
<li><code>TableCellPaddingCommand</code>,</li>
<li><code>TableAlignmentCommand</code>,</li>
<li><code>TableBackgroundColorCommand</code>,</li>
<li><code>TableBorderColorCommand</code>,</li>
<li><code>TableBorderStyleCommand</code>,</li>
<li><code>TableBorderWidthCommand</code>,</li>
<li><code>TableHeightCommand</code>,</li>
<li><code>TablePropertyCommand</code>,</li>
<li><code>TableWidthCommand</code>.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-features-7" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#features-7"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Features</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>Introduced the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/document-version-control-for-any-software-ckeditor-5-revision-history/" rel="nofollow">Revision History</a> feature that allows the users to create, view and restore content versions.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>SchemaItemDefinition#allowChildren</code> property simplifying the defining of which other items are allowed inside this schema item definition. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9261">#9261</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/6a37ecc7b97095e82d165f16ced6843be8b6f565">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>'mouseover'</code> and <code>'mouseout'</code> events in the <code>MouseObserver</code> class. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9338">#9338</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/79454f872b26db6fafa56aa63dd5f4e5a4ec6477">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The <code>StylesProcessor</code> reducer for the <code>border:*</code> CSS property was extended to be able to merge to the <code>border:*</code> property if all its properties (width, style and color) are specified. Otherwise, the <code>border-(width|style|color)</code> definition should be returned. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9490">#9490</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5e1328b670badc9d0abb8a56882d4158294b1386">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Added support for table captions. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/3204">#3204</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b5427212077469cf50fdd196611ec6b5767daa99">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Added support for the default table cell properties. Read more about it <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/features/table.html#default-table-and-table-cell-styles" rel="nofollow">in the table feature guide</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/37f1699760695c58b2da0a30fee1579a7a38236d">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Added support for the default table properties. Read more about it <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/features/table.html#default-table-and-table-cell-styles" rel="nofollow">in the table feature guide</a>. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8502">#8502</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9219">#9219</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/efe5e5744c83b910c06b8b763ae177b617a33eb2">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-bug-fixes-7" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bug-fixes-7"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Bug fixes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-comments" rel="nofollow">comments</a></strong>: Fixed comments marker conversion that would fail if the comment marker is in a model document fragment.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Added checks for the upcast attribute-to-marker converter before changing the data and consuming view elements. Part of <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9779">#9779</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8f51495fa5090262588cfded3982c73b71aa4b8b">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Updated <code>downcastwriter</code> to allow setting up attribute element's priority to <code>0</code>. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5797">#5797</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/7422073bfef2460ca1fb4ec297b5c018f553d7aa">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The <code>model.deleteContent()</code> method should not exclude a block widget at the end of the deletion range. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/56a307accc861484d0dd4b26f293437a8aa3ee83">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The conversion upcast <code>elementToAttribute()</code> and <code>attributeToAttribute()</code> functions should not call the <code>model.value()</code> callback if the element will not be converted. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9536">#9536</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/efe5e5744c83b910c06b8b763ae177b617a33eb2">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The renderer should not crash when removing multiple DOM nodes in the same render cycle. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9534">#9534</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/75ebb48d970a1ec112084d0c8247ba04bb20d7c2">commit</a>). Thanks to <a href="https://github.com/bendemboski">bendemboski</a>!</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-embed" rel="nofollow">html-embed</a></strong>: Allow rendering the <code>&lt;script&gt;</code> element inside the HTML preview. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8326">#8326</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/17cbd380cbbfd813f2d142dd7fca18e45eed5f1c">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: All text attributes starting their names with <code>link</code> will be removed when typing over a link or clicking at the end of the link. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8462">#8462</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5a2fbb2e92e6d7cbeb9b1b4389a7b0969bd0c0b8">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: Fixed a crash when applying a spell checker suggestion to a word inside a list item. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9325">#9325</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/7d3e0981df77a4422f4efdcefca0c587577fd0fa">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-media-embed" rel="nofollow">media-embed</a></strong>: Added support for more Google Maps URL formats (<code>goo.gl/maps</code>, <code>maps.google.com</code>, <code>maps.app.goo.gl</code>). Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/2762">#2762</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/a5991c9017e1591bd0c165a02732b46967aea008">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-track-changes" rel="nofollow">track-changes</a></strong>: Fixed a crash happening in some scenarios when a block quote deletion suggestion was accepted.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-track-changes" rel="nofollow">track-changes</a></strong>: Fixed a crash with inline formatting suggestion in the content with a <code>&lt;br&gt;</code> tag.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong> Fixed arrow handling with the toolbar focused in case of RTL language UI. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5585">#5585</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/2d2e34f5176935ad3003c6d1ab3f274baa85d8d9">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: Pasting plain text while the widget fake caret is active should not remove the widget. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9477">#9477</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/9978a9ab11f86ec46c2c04ba8d63c73bd35d4f07">commit</a>)</li>
<li>All non-DLL packages will re-export their modules instead of exporting the default object with these modules as the object entries. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9134">#9134</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/e010f382d158a0bd594d84457ddc665f480e2c53">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-other-changes-7" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#other-changes-7"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Other changes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-comments" rel="nofollow">comments</a></strong>: Improved performance for handling a huge number of annotations.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: In the marker-to-data conversion, attributes for marker boundaries will be used every time the marker starts or ends before or after the model element, instead of only where a text is not allowed by the model schema. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9622">#9622</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/36b685ce665431a7df31179e3b4e15f2fa4a81e4">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-export-pdf" rel="nofollow">export-pdf</a></strong>: The <code>exportPdf</code> command will not be disabled if the editor goes into read-only mode as it does not impact the data.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-export-word" rel="nofollow">export-word</a></strong>: The <code>exportWord</code> command will not be disabled if the editor goes into read-only mode as it does not impact the data.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Border definitions produced by the <code>TableProperties</code> and <code>TableCellProperties</code> features will be merged into a group if possible. Instead of producing the <code>border-(top|right|bottom|left):*</code> property, the <code>border:*</code> definition will be returned. The same applies to the table cell padding. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9490">#9490</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5e1328b670badc9d0abb8a56882d4158294b1386">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Updated translations. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/92a03a9ddf66b6b22507396d4bc91e2a0e1f52cc">commit</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ed70b6f1165e075888572231ad4a2fdad58c23a0">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Added plugin metadata to packages. Introducing new guides for the metadata and the present HTML output of the features. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6642">#6642</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/cad8a725b0e3b730f08fcf8368ec57d6f94156d2">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>

<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-release-highlights-8" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#release-highlights-8"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Release highlights</h3>
<p dir="auto">We are happy to announce the release of CKEditor 5 v27.1.0.</p>
<p dir="auto">This release introduces some new features:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>Support for <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/3232">nested tables</a>.</li>
<li>Support for <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9210">nested block quotes</a>.</li>
<li>Content with the <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9193">deprecated <code>align</code> attribute</a> can now be loaded into the editor (but will be transformed to a modern format).</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">There were also a few bug fixes:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>The empty value in the configuration (<code>config.initialData</code>) will have <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8974">precedence over a non-empty DOM element when creating the editor</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9315">The watchdog feature does not import CKEditor 5 utilities</a> to avoid code duplication in external framework integrations.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9370">Dragging the entire table cell</a> is no longer possible.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9372">The selection will no longer get stuck in read-only mode</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8921">Attributes that have already been set are no longer overridden while setting attributes upon upcast conversion</a>, as this caused text styles to not be properly converted.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Read more in the blog post: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v27.1.0-with-table-and-block-quote-nesting/" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v27.1.0-with-table-and-block-quote-nesting/</a>.</p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-6" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-6"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MINOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Added the new <code>useFillerType()</code> method in the <code>DataProcessor</code> interface. Classes based on this interface should implement <code>useFillerType()</code> to avoid errors.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-upload" rel="nofollow">upload</a></strong>: The asynchronous <code>SimpleUploadAdapter#upload()</code> method resolves to an object with normalized data including the <code>urls</code> object, which was only returned before. This may affect all integrations depending on the <code>SimpleUploadAdapter</code> uploading mechanism.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-features-8" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#features-8"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Features</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-alignment" rel="nofollow">alignment</a></strong>: Added support for the deprecated <code>align</code> attribute. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9193">#9193</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/3c69604b2ed6b0c17bec666d66d6742bd711bca7">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-block-quote" rel="nofollow">block-quote</a></strong>: Added support for nested block quotes. Check the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/builds/guides/migration/migration-to-27.html#migration-to-ckeditor-5-v2710" rel="nofollow">migration guide</a> if you want to disable this behavior and disallow nesting quotes. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9210">#9210</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/18de0e24681351d5ddcf7bdb605f066775369dcc">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Introduced new "markedNbsp" block filler mode in <code>DomConverter</code>, in which <code>&lt;span data-cke-filler="true"&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;</code> is inserted, to prevent leaking extra space characters into the data. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5217b3063db01fdebd46ebb6309ccf4ff21f7e03">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Introduced <code>useFillerType()</code> in <code>HtmlDataProcessor</code> and <code>XmlDataProcessor</code> to switch between using marked and regular <code>nbsp</code> block fillers. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9345">#9345</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5217b3063db01fdebd46ebb6309ccf4ff21f7e03">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Enabled marker downcast for document fragments. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9460">#9460</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5b99c75814efb1b0caadd0c765879c28f2671415">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>uploadComplete</code> event in <code>ImageUploadEditing</code> that allows customizing the image element (e.g. setting custom attributes) based on the data retrieved from the upload adapter. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5204">#5204</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/bf5b561425dd497a40b7ca6a074279823fb5a84e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-media-embed" rel="nofollow">media-embed</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>config.mediaEmbed.elementName</code> to allow setting semantic element name. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9373">#9373</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/aefc6a29b189cb5d9366d6344ee450b01130f3d1">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Added support for nested tables. Check the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/builds/guides/migration/migration-to-27.html#migration-to-ckeditor-5-v2710" rel="nofollow">migration guide</a> if you want to disable this behavior and disallow nesting tables. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/3232">#3232</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/e0eca47a42dc3813e2a02ba811cc56675334051c">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-upload" rel="nofollow">upload</a></strong>: The upload adapters' asynchronous <code>#upload()</code> method resolves to an object with additional properties along with the <code>urls</code> hash. See more in <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5204">#5204</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/bf5b561425dd497a40b7ca6a074279823fb5a84e">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-bug-fixes-8" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bug-fixes-8"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Bug fixes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-clipboard" rel="nofollow">clipboard</a></strong>: The selection was stuck and impossible to change in read-only mode. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9372">#9372</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5735af2b6cd9fa8b41e9f09172c2440c1a4471af">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-clipboard" rel="nofollow">clipboard</a></strong>: The nested editable element should not be dragged. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9370">#9370</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5735af2b6cd9fa8b41e9f09172c2440c1a4471af">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-code-block" rel="nofollow">code-block</a></strong>: Markers created in or on code block element are now preserved after the document is loaded. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9402">#9402</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/2616f8b5240bc8966d0ec0cadcd4bf23ddd75431">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-core" rel="nofollow">core</a></strong>: The <code>MultiCommand.execute()</code> method prevents calling undefined commands. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/e142d6d6342000421088703449231bb0f0b468de">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: While setting attributes upon upcast conversion, do not override attributes that have already been set. The correct behavior is to keep the attributes applied by the deepest nodes in the view tree as, in most cases, the deepest node will have precedence (e.g. an inline style applied by the deepest node). Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8921">#8921</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/9a819feb6a27f45f8eabf66a3fa357386ccfa5fe">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-track-changes" rel="nofollow">track-changes</a></strong>: Accepting multiple "turn on/off list item" suggestions (created by multiple users) that should cause the same effect will have a correct result now.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-watchdog" rel="nofollow">watchdog</a></strong>: Removed imports from the <code>ckeditor5</code> package. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9315">#9315</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/c1fa757973bce0b150aefd22ddb5f16bc7e4814a">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: Hide the selection handler in the nested widget if the outer widget is hovered or selected. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9453">#9453</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8964">#8964</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/fbfe726136b4c0fa298de33db3fcccd93d1bb161">commit</a>)</li>
<li>The editor was not initialized with the empty data for <code>config.initialData</code> set to an empty string. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8974">#8974</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/bce8267e16fccb25448b4c68acc3bf54336aa087">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-other-changes-8" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#other-changes-8"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Other changes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>config.forceValue</code> option to <code>ListCommand</code> that forces turning list items on or off instead of toggling. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/e16448576cdc40ff76fe19058bea2954bf536411">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Updated translations. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4a663d79fe065b251b873b2ff5c67697dc214cf6">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-real-time-collaboration" rel="nofollow">real-time-collaboration</a></strong>: The <code>Editor.create()</code> method will throw an error if the initial websocket connection cannot be established.</li>
</ul>

<h2 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-2700-2021-03-22" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#2700-2021-03-22"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/compare/v26.0.0...v27.0.0">27.0.0</a> (2021-03-22)</h2>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-release-highlights-9" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#release-highlights-9"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Release highlights</h3>
<p dir="auto">We are happy to announce the release of CKEditor 5 v27.0.0 that contains security fixes for multiple packages: <code>ckeditor5-engine</code>, <code>ckeditor5-font</code>, <code>ckeditor5-image</code>, <code>ckeditor5-list</code>, <code>ckeditor5-markdown-gfm</code>, <code>ckeditor5-media-embed</code>, <code>ckeditor5-paste-from-office</code>, <code>ckeditor5-widget</code>. Even though this is a low impact issue and only affects the victim's browser with no risk of data leakage, an upgrade is highly recommended! You can read more details in the relevant <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/security/advisories/GHSA-3rh3-wfr4-76mj">security advisory</a> and <a href="https://ckeditor.com/contact/" rel="nofollow">contact us</a> if you have more questions.</p>
<p dir="auto">The CKEditor 5 team would like to thank Yeting Li for recognizing and reporting these vulnerabilities.</p>
<p dir="auto">Starting from this version, collaboration features release notes will be included in the CKEditor 5 changelog. Changes for the previous releases are available on <a href="https://ckeditor.com/collaboration/changelog/" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/collaboration/changelog/</a>.</p>
<p dir="auto">This release introduces some new features:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>The new <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/features/language.html" rel="nofollow">text part language</a> feature allows you to define the language for each passage of content written in multiple languages. This helps satisfy the WCAG Success Criterion 3.1.2 Language of Parts.</li>
<li>Support for <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/features/pasting/drag-drop.html" rel="nofollow">drag and dropping of textual content and block objects</a> (like images and tables) within the editor.</li>
<li>Support for <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/features/pasting/drag-drop.html" rel="nofollow">dropping HTML content from outside of the editor</a> into the editor.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8516">Alignment can now be set using classes</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8877">Typing <code>[x]</code> will now insert a checked to-do list item</a>.</li>
<li>Support for <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/deep-dive/event-system.html#view-events-bubbling" rel="nofollow">bubbling of <code>view.Document</code> events</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Read more in the blog post: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v27.0.0-with-drag-and-drop-text-part-language-and-bubbling-events/" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v27.0.0-with-drag-and-drop-text-part-language-and-bubbling-events/</a>.</p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-4" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-4"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MAJOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<p dir="auto"><strong>Note:</strong> Check out the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/builds/guides/migration/migration-to-27.html" rel="nofollow">Migration to CKEditor 5 v27.0.0</a> guide for more detailed information on how to upgrade to this version.</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-clipboard" rel="nofollow">clipboard</a></strong>: The <code>inputTransformation</code> event is no longer fired by the <code>Clipboard</code> plugin. Now the <code>ClipboardPipeline</code> plugin is responsible for firing this event (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9128">#9128</a>).</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-clipboard" rel="nofollow">clipboard</a></strong>: The <code>clipboardInput</code> and <code>inputTransformation</code> events should not be fired or stopped in the feature code. The <code>data.content</code> property should be assigned to override the default content instead. You can stop this event only if you want to completely disable pasting or dropping of some content. <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/builds/guides/migration/migration-to-27.html#clipboard-input-pipeline-integration" rel="nofollow">Read more about the clipboard pipeline in the migration to v27.0.0 guide</a>. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9128">#9128</a>.</li>
<li>Introduced bubbling of the <code>view.Document</code> events, similar to how bubbling works in the DOM. This allowed us to re-prioritize many listeners that previously had to rely on the <code>priority</code> property. However, it means that existing listeners that use priorities may now be executed at a wrong time. The listeners to such events should be reviewed in terms of when they should be executed (in what context/element/phase). <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/builds/guides/migration/migration-to-27.html#the-viewdocument-event-bubbling" rel="nofollow">Read more about event bubbling in the migration to v27.0.0 guide</a>. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8640">#8640</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-features-9" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#features-9"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Features</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-alignment" rel="nofollow">alignment</a></strong>: Introduced an option to use classes instead of inline styles. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8516">#8516</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/638543bd6d3f1e1c1ffc864e4d4007744fffc62c">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-autoformat" rel="nofollow">autoformat</a></strong>: Typing <code>[x]</code> will insert a checked to-do list item. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8877">#8877</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/18be7dabaf62c763bd3272fc8467aec0ae94ac98">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-clipboard" rel="nofollow">clipboard</a></strong>: Implemented basic support for content drag and drop. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9128">#9128</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8461da5fd6d3e050b8fd15aecf4527a83d0899af">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-clipboard" rel="nofollow">clipboard</a></strong>: The <code>contentInsertion</code> event is fired from <code>ClipboardPipeline</code> to enable customization of content insertion (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9128">#9128</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8461da5fd6d3e050b8fd15aecf4527a83d0899af">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-core" rel="nofollow">core</a></strong>: Created the universal caption icon. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9196">#9196</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/6dce730c27db063c13c71d363458731cb57faac9">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Introduced bubbling of the <code>view.Document</code> events, similar to how bubbling works in the DOM. Bubbling allows listening on a view event on a specific kind of element, hence simplifying code that needs to handle a specific event for only that element (e.g. <code>enter</code> in <code>blockquote</code> elements only). Read more in the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/deep-dive/event-system.html" rel="nofollow">Event system deep-dive guide</a>. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8640">#8640</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5527283324ad8bef5231acde0e49f9fc78df9c90">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Introduced <code>ArrowKeysObserver</code>. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8640">#8640</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5527283324ad8bef5231acde0e49f9fc78df9c90">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-language" rel="nofollow">language</a></strong>: Added support for setting the text part language. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8989">#8989</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-bug-fixes-9" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bug-fixes-9"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Bug fixes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: <code>DataController#toView()</code> should have a default value for the <code>options</code> parameter. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9293">#9293</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/f77a3d57bddb96ae3280736f974cfd0b148611cb">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-highlight" rel="nofollow">highlight</a></strong> The remove highlight button now also gets disabled along with the main highlight command. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9174">#9174</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/04acdfec9e7ee4b38daa1ef372e201f535d960fc">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-utils" rel="nofollow">utils</a></strong>: The <code>EmitterMixin#listenTo()</code> method is split into listener and emitter parts. The <code>ObservableMixin</code> decorated methods reverted to the original method while destroying an observable. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5527283324ad8bef5231acde0e49f9fc78df9c90">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-other-changes-9" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#other-changes-9"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Other changes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-clipboard" rel="nofollow">clipboard</a></strong>: The paste as plain text feature was extracted to the dedicated <code>PastePlainText</code> plugin (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9128">#9128</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8461da5fd6d3e050b8fd15aecf4527a83d0899af">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The <code>mouseup</code> event is fired by the <code>MouseObserver</code> (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9128">#9128</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8461da5fd6d3e050b8fd15aecf4527a83d0899af">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The <code>mouseup</code> event is no longer fired by the <code>MouseEventsObserver</code> from the <code>@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table</code> package (now handled by <code>MouseObserver</code>) (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/9128">#9128</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8461da5fd6d3e050b8fd15aecf4527a83d0899af">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-typing" rel="nofollow">typing</a></strong>: The <code>TwoStepCaretMovement</code> feature is now using bubbling events. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7437">#7437</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5527283324ad8bef5231acde0e49f9fc78df9c90">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-utils" rel="nofollow">utils</a></strong>: Added the <code>language.getLanguageDirection</code> helper function allowing to determine the text direction based on the language code. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/9f1b10fc8efd61b4bf9f4234c8d8b84e705af9b6">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Optimized icons. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/358a653c18853f5bc4afba04da2ea3b883b5d1d6">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Updated English translations for the text part language feature. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/eaed55a23dccd44c2a37dac5d820940458170903">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>

<h2 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-2600-2021-03-01" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#2600-2021-03-01"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/compare/v25.0.0...v26.0.0">26.0.0</a> (2021-03-01)</h2>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-release-highlights-10" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#release-highlights-10"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Release highlights</h3>
<p dir="auto">We are happy to announce the release of CKEditor 5 v26.0.0.</p>
<p dir="auto">This release brings some new features:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8395">It is now possible to add plugins to CKEditor 5 builds</a>. Read more in the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/builds/guides/development/dll-builds.html" rel="nofollow">DLL builds</a> guide.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8058">The editor placeholder now behaves like a native input placeholder</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/1633">It is now possible to style inline widgets (e.g. with bold)</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8621">The font feature now supports loading legacy <code>&lt;font&gt;</code> elements</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">There were also some important bug fixes and improvements:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8633">Autoformat will no longer create a code block when typing in bulleted or numbered lists</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8884">Indent buttons order was reversed in all default build configurations</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8917">Copying a nested table pasted into the editor no longer crashes it</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8852">A period now sticks to the preceding word during word wrap</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5705">The <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> key is now translated to <kbd>Cmd</kbd> on macOS</a> to avoid conflicts with some macOS keyboard shortcuts.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Read more in the blog post: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v26.0.0-with-extensible-builds-inline-widget-styling-and-annotations-guides/" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v26.0.0-with-extensible-builds-inline-widget-styling-and-annotations-guides/</a>.</p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-collaboration-features" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#collaboration-features"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Collaboration features</h3>
<p dir="auto">The CKEditor 5 Collaboration features changelog can be found here: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/collaboration/changelog" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/collaboration/changelog</a>.</p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-5" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-5"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MAJOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<p dir="auto"><strong>Note:</strong> Check out the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/builds/guides/migration/migration-to-26.html" rel="nofollow">Migration to CKEditor 5 v26.0.0</a> guide for more detailed information on how to upgrade to this version.</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>
<p dir="auto">Several plugins are not loaded automatically as dependencies of other plugins anymore. From now on, they need to be provided by the editor creator manually (via <code>config.plugins</code>). This list includes:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>The <code>CloudServicesUploadAdapter</code> plugin no longer loads <code>CloudServices</code>. Make sure to add <code>CloudServices</code> to the editor plugins when using the <code>CloudServicesUploadAdapter</code> or <code>EasyImage</code> features.</li>
<li>The <code>EasyImage</code> plugin no longer loads <code>Image</code> and <code>ImageUpload</code>. Make sure to add <code>Image</code> and <code>ImageUpload</code> to the editor plugins when using the <code>EasyImage</code> feature.</li>
<li>The <code>CKFinder</code> plugin no longer loads <code>CKFinderUploadAdapter</code>. The <code>CKFinderEditing</code> plugin no longer loads <code>ImageEditing</code> and <code>LinkEditing</code> features. Make sure to add <code>CKFinderUploadAdapter</code>, <code>Image</code>, and <code>Link</code> features to the editor plugins when using the <code>CKFinder</code> feature.</li>
<li>The <code>Title</code> plugin no longer loads <code>Paragraph</code>. Make sure to add <code>Paragraph</code> to the editor plugins when using the <code>Title</code> feature.</li>
<li>The <code>ListEditing</code> plugin no longer loads <code>Paragraph</code>. Make sure to add <code>Paragraph</code> to the editor plugins when using the <code>List</code> feature.</li>
<li>The <code>LinkImageEditing</code> plugin no longer loads <code>ImageEditing</code>. Make sure to add <code>Image</code> to the editor plugins when using the <code>LinkImage</code> feature.</li>
<li>The <code>LinkImageUI</code> plugin no longer loads <code>Image</code>. Make sure to add <code>Image</code> to the editor plugins when using the <code>LinkImage</code> feature.</li>
<li>The <code>ExportPdf</code> plugin no longer loads <code>CloudServices</code>. Make sure to add <code>CloudServices</code> to the editor plugins when using the <code>ExportPdf</code> feature.</li>
<li>The <code>ExportWord</code> plugin no longer loads <code>CloudServices</code>. Make sure to add <code>CloudServices</code> to the editor plugins when using the <code>ExportWord</code> feature.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor-cloud-services-core" rel="nofollow">cloud-services-core</a></strong>: The package was merged into <code>@ckeditor/ckeditor5-cloud-services</code>. All classes that were available in the <code>@ckeditor/ckeditor-cloud-services-core</code> package were moved to the <code>@ckeditor/ckeditor5-cloud-services</code> package. They should now be instantiated via factory methods on the <code>CloudServicesCore</code> plugin that is located in <code>@ckeditor/ckeditor5-cloud-services</code>. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8811">#8811</a>.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The following modules were moved (before → after):</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><code>image/image/imageinsertcommand~ImageInsertCommand</code> → <code>image/image/insertimagecommand~InsertImageCommand</code></li>
<li><code>image/imageresize/imageresizecommand~ImageResizeCommand</code> → <code>image/imageresize/resizeimagecommand~ResizeImageCommand</code></li>
<li><code>image/imageupload/imageuploadcommand~ImageUploadCommand</code> → <code>image/imageupload/uploadimagecommand~UploadImageCommand</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: The to-do list item toggle keystroke changed to <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>Enter</kbd> (<kbd>Cmd</kbd>+<kbd>Enter</kbd> on Mac).</p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: The <code>list/todolistcheckedcommand~TodoListCheckCommand</code> module was moved to <code>list/checktodolistcommand~CheckTodoListCommand</code>.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto">Keystrokes with the <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> modifier will not be handled on macOS unless the modifier is registered as a forced one (for example: <code>Ctrl!+A</code> will not be translated to <code>Cmd+A</code> on macOS).</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-features-10" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#features-10"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Features</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-cloud-services" rel="nofollow">cloud-services</a></strong>: Created the <code>CloudServicesCore</code> plugin that provides the base API for communication with CKEditor Cloud Services. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/959c1d6d56d43468f01afed6c27637a449f78515">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-core" rel="nofollow">core</a></strong>: The <code>PluginCollection</code> class will allow requiring a plugin by name if it is provided in <code>config.plugins</code> or if it was already loaded. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/2907">#2907</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b278fde89d1eb635be7e4e3a57d8dba2bd0f98a6">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: <code>ContainerElement</code> can be marked as <code>isAllowedInsideAttributeElement</code> in order to allow wrapping it with attribute elements. This is useful, for example, for inline widgets. Other element types (UI, Raw, Empty) have this flag on by default but it can be changed via <code>options.isAllowedInsideAttributeElement</code> to <code>false</code>. Read more in the <code>DowncastWriter#create*()</code> methods documentation. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/1633">#1633</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/fcb166ea2bed00cb83eb1c226a6923a6de2e706e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-font" rel="nofollow">font</a></strong>: Added support for the <code>&lt;font&gt;</code> element. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8621">#8621</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/0545fe6515f5454f7c7961ee2415c23366e2da08">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-utils" rel="nofollow">utils</a></strong>: Added the forced modifier key (<code>Ctrl!</code>) for keystrokes that should not be mapped to <kbd>Cmd</kbd> on macOS. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8dac3a98bb93cc6e1d0bfa8d2db8a5d9a6f89988">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-bug-fixes-10" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bug-fixes-10"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Bug fixes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/search?q=keywords%3Ackeditor5-build%20maintainer%3Ackeditor" rel="nofollow">build-*</a></strong>: Switched the order of indent buttons in the default build configuration to "outdent, indent". Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8884">#8884</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/1e4217506c19fdceb6700b928d86cf464859c57c">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: <code>DowncastWriter</code> should handle <code>UIElements</code> consistently while wrapping with and inserting them into attribute elements. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8959">#8959</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/fcb166ea2bed00cb83eb1c226a6923a6de2e706e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Words should not break on link boundaries. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8852">#8852</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b67732d66525a814a591c6b185acbfb3b54c3792">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Undoing the deletion of merged paragraphs should result in the original tree. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8976">#8976</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ecba70b44a0185bf5193da7bd77907bd981da74d">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Pasting formatted single-line text over a widget should not split it into multiple paragraphs. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8953">#8953</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/dfe803553789de8b162b0dd7fbfac4c419a9b806">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The editor placeholder should not disappear until typing started. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8689">#8689</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8a276bdb4f09a74b4e67a4bfe4ddc3409edf84ef">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Fixed content is not restored on undo when multiple blocks and widgets were removed. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8870">#8870</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/385234a66ae0168bc57a36d7ec9f1e8f759e0b69">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-font" rel="nofollow">font</a></strong>: Fixed the <code>supportAllValues</code> configuration for the font size and font family features to work with nested elements (tables). Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7965">#7965</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/768466c6e0e18b0f4c2230b1f66a2defb2496c50">commit</a>). Thanks to <a href="https://github.com/dkrahn">@dkrahn</a>!</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-heading" rel="nofollow">heading</a></strong>: In the <code>Title</code> plugin, the body placeholder is visible even when the body section is focused. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8689">#8689</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8a276bdb4f09a74b4e67a4bfe4ddc3409edf84ef">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The image caption placeholder is now hidden when focused. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8689">#8689</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8a276bdb4f09a74b4e67a4bfe4ddc3409edf84ef">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: The <code>Autolink</code> plugin will no longer automatically match domains that only have a <code>www</code> subdomain followed with a top level domain, e.g. <code>http://www.test</code>. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8050">#8050</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/2165447015f688b864a29e50a543e2411ecc9e11">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: IP addresses should be converted into links by the autolink feature while typing. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8881">#8881</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5b85b86160d991f24f5ff46700e1ea90703c40bd">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-media-embed" rel="nofollow">media-embed</a></strong>: The <code>insertMediaEmbed</code> command should be disabled if any non-media object is selected (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8798">#8798</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/428917601db732c6dfab48380eda2d8bbbfc7e19">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The <code>insertTable</code> command should be disabled if any object is selected. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8798">#8798</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/428917601db732c6dfab48380eda2d8bbbfc7e19">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-utils" rel="nofollow">utils</a></strong>: The editor keystrokes are no longer conflicting on macOS. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5705">#5705</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8dac3a98bb93cc6e1d0bfa8d2db8a5d9a6f89988">commit</a>)</li>
<li>The editor will show the placeholder even when focused. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8689">#8689</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8a276bdb4f09a74b4e67a4bfe4ddc3409edf84ef">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-other-changes-10" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#other-changes-10"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Other changes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>
<p dir="auto">Enabled creating builds that can be extended (with more plugins) without the need to recompile. This required splitting the project into the so-called DLL part and consumers of this DLL. Under the hood, the mechanism is based on <a href="https://webpack.js.org/plugins/dll-plugin/" rel="nofollow">webpack DLLs</a>. This is the first part of the required changes and it contains the necessary breaking changes (see the "MAJOR BREAKING CHANGES" section above). For more information, see the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/builds/guides/development/dll-builds.html" rel="nofollow">DLL builds</a> guide. Closes [<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8395">#8395</a>](<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8395">https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8395</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b278fde89d1eb635be7e4e3a57d8dba2bd0f98a6">commit</a>)</p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor-cloud-services-core" rel="nofollow">cloud-services-core</a></strong>: All classes available in the <code>@ckeditor/ckeditor-cloud-services-core</code> package were moved to the <code>@ckeditor/ckeditor5-cloud-services</code> package. They should now be instantiated via factory methods on the <code>CloudServicesCore</code> plugin. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8811">#8811</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/959c1d6d56d43468f01afed6c27637a449f78515">commit</a>)</p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The <code>KeyObserver</code> should provide information about <code>metaKey</code> being pressed. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8dac3a98bb93cc6e1d0bfa8d2db8a5d9a6f89988">commit</a>)</p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Add WebP format support to the inline pasting of images from source URLs. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/48ad51d61e10473bab106c17d83b6e05188cd915">commit</a>)</p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>Image.isImageWidget()</code> utility method. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b278fde89d1eb635be7e4e3a57d8dba2bd0f98a6">commit</a>)</p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: The to-do list item toggle keystroke changed to <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>Enter</kbd> (<kbd>Cmd</kbd>+<kbd>Enter</kbd> on Mac). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8dac3a98bb93cc6e1d0bfa8d2db8a5d9a6f89988">commit</a>)</p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: The <code>checkSelectionOnObject</code> function should be exported by the <code>@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget</code> package (as <code>@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget/src/utils</code>) (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8798">#8798</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/428917601db732c6dfab48380eda2d8bbbfc7e19">commit</a>)</p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto">Updated translations. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/aa272552fa06e2320f8b7d3c4e0079b187260b36">commit</a>)</p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto">Unified button and command naming conventions. Old names are available as aliases. Read more about these changes in the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/contributing/code-style.html#buttons-commands-and-plugins" rel="nofollow">Code style</a> guide. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8033">#8033</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/e0fcb17d404352133609aa6875d62e056261677f">commit</a>)</p>
<p dir="auto">Changes in toolbar buttons (before → after):</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><code>imageUpload</code> → <code>uploadImage</code></li>
<li><code>imageResize</code> → <code>resizeImage</code></li>
<li><code>imageInsert</code> → <code>insertImage</code></li>
<li><code>imageResize:*</code> → <code>resizeImage:*</code></li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Changes in command names:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><code>imageInsert</code> → <code>insertImage</code></li>
<li><code>imageUpload</code> → <code>uploadImage</code></li>
<li><code>imageResize</code> → <code>resizeImage</code></li>
<li><code>forwardDelete</code> → <code>deleteForward</code></li>
<li><code>todoListCheck</code> → <code>checkTodoList</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
