<h2 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-2500-2021-01-25" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#2500-2021-01-25"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/compare/v24.0.0...v25.0.0">25.0.0</a> (2021-01-25)</h2>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-release-highlights-11" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#release-highlights-11"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Release highlights</h3>
<p dir="auto">We are happy to announce the release of CKEditor 5 v25.0.0 that contains a security fix for the <a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-markdown-gfm" rel="nofollow">Markdown-GFM package</a>. Even though this is a low impact issue and only affects the victim’s browser with no risk of data leakage, an upgrade is highly recommended! You can read more details in the relevant <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/security/advisories/GHSA-hgmg-hhc8-g5wr">security advisory</a> and <a href="https://ckeditor.com/contact/" rel="nofollow">contact us</a> if you have more questions.</p>
<p dir="auto">This release brings a few improvements and bug fixes:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>UX improvements to editing around the block boundaries (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8137">#8137</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7636">#7636</a>).</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8188">Formatting large content will not freeze the editor</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7957">Uploading Base64 images will no longer cause a CSP violation</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8401">Unlinking an image will not crash the editor anymore</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Read more in the blog post: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/CKEditor-5-v25.0.0-with-flexible-annotations-improved-text-blocks-handling-and-performance-fixes/" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/blog/CKEditor-5-v25.0.0-with-flexible-annotations-improved-text-blocks-handling-and-performance-fixes/</a></p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-collaboration-features-1" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#collaboration-features-1"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Collaboration features</h3>
<p dir="auto">The CKEditor 5 Collaboration features changelog can be found here: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/collaboration/changelog" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/collaboration/changelog</a>.</p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-7" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-7"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MINOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: Configuration passed to <code>ToolbarView.fillFromConfig()</code> will be stripped off of any leading, trailing, and duplicated separators (<code>'|'</code> and <code>'-'</code>).</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-features-11" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#features-11"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Features</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-autoformat" rel="nofollow">autoformat</a></strong>: The horizontal line can be inserted by typing <code>---</code> in an empty block. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5720">#5720</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/740327ed564a83a14bf95e61f9267c6296544522">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-autoformat" rel="nofollow">autoformat</a></strong>: Square brackets should convert the current line to a to-do list item. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7518">#7518</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/9b7e7c9b4d12da8f591bec438a6fb7ccd296bfd0">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-block-quote" rel="nofollow">block-quote</a></strong>: The block quote should be split on the <kbd>Backspace</kbd> key press at the beginning of the block quote. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7636">#7636</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/2d9954c6634ba07293da85b292a0601b7947ef2c">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The new <code>DataController#htmlProcessor</code> property is initialized with the instance of the <code>HtmlDataProcessor</code> class and assigned to the <code>DataController#processor</code> property by default. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/2025f40e525a122761e64bd05c4f6c7b2df75516">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-typing" rel="nofollow">typing</a></strong>: An empty block element at the beginning of the limit element should be converted to a paragraph on the <kbd>Backspace</kbd> key press. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8137">#8137</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/2d9954c6634ba07293da85b292a0601b7947ef2c">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: Implemented additional <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_ui_dropdown_dropdownview-DropdownView.html#static-member-defaultPanelPositions" rel="nofollow">panel positions</a> for the <code>DropdownView</code> class to address edge cases when the panel is cut due to small screen size (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7700">#7700</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8669">#8669</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/52ce85b00374da9ad0b90e99f0746540a6631f55">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: Items baked into the editor bundles can now be removed from the toolbar by using <code>config.toolbar.removeItems</code>. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7945">#7945</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/1af9e7b8501f9d6e8db35c2f41cf8e4157aaee7c">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-bug-fixes-11" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bug-fixes-11"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Bug fixes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-autoformat" rel="nofollow">autoformat</a></strong>: Formatting will not be applied to <code>snake_case_scenarios</code> anymore. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/2388">#2388</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/82d486d2cb6616c2e1d00b49ab993bbf24847749">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The <code>setData()</code> helper in the dev-utils model should support the <code>batchType</code> option. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7947">#7947</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/6e40289d5db52f0b9be4b53474401b45b34423be">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-export-pdf" rel="nofollow">export-pdf</a></strong>: The command should use the proper token if executed without providing a token in the command options.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-export-word" rel="nofollow">export-word</a></strong>: The command should use the proper token if executed without providing a token in the command options.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-horizontal-line" rel="nofollow">horizontal-line</a></strong>: The horizontal line feature should require the <code>Widget</code> plugin. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8825">#8825</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/9f26d2b7f96eb495ae904a02799a6072cd77b22e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-embed" rel="nofollow">html-embed</a></strong>: Pasting an HTML embed widget from the clipboard will not clear its content anymore. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8789">#8789</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/2025f40e525a122761e64bd05c4f6c7b2df75516">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-embed" rel="nofollow">html-embed</a></strong>: The HTML embed plugin should require the <code>Widget</code> plugin. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8720">#8720</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8ef02e7a1543e1191b63488ba58b0281bdb8b1ee">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-embed" rel="nofollow">html-embed</a></strong>: The save button should close the source mode even if there are no changes. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8560">#8560</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5e26d5372e3d3d417c81aa98d1313f9a68f2f7ce">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The image plugins can be loaded in any order without causing an error. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8270">#8270</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/1c7397db168f032181d562153535cab2a3ac6c66">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Allow pasting an image with a data URL scheme as the value of the <code>src</code> attribute if strict CSP rules are defined. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7957">#7957</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/f7a3948d954bb9ef064505e666d112ed5a4240a6">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Fixed the image resizer for images with links. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8749">#8749</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/abd2c67f5779f82f057984771f5cd27b3fd95528">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: An empty image caption should be hidden if the editor is in read-only mode. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5168">#5168</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/cab40650f1e5649b518f0159ae97c4d7a470b55a">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Removing a link from an image should not throw an error when link decorators are also present. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8401">#8401</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/a26c6532e2090b47816961c8344b258d237f28d0">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: The <code>delete</code> event handler is now listening on a higher priority to avoid being intercepted by the block quote and widget handlers. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8706">#8706</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/2d9954c6634ba07293da85b292a0601b7947ef2c">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-pagination" rel="nofollow">pagination</a></strong>: The pagination plugin should be disabled and a warning should be displayed if its configuration is missing.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-page-break" rel="nofollow">page-break</a></strong>: Dropping an image on the page break widget should not crash the editor. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8788">#8788</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/c9654e983bf41583f2bf09c1932752d86409507b">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-page-break" rel="nofollow">page-break</a></strong>: The page break feature should require the <code>Widget</code> plugin. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8825">#8825</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/9f26d2b7f96eb495ae904a02799a6072cd77b22e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-special-characters" rel="nofollow">special-characters</a></strong>: The special characters dropdown should always fit into the viewport. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7700">#7700</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8669">#8669</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/52ce85b00374da9ad0b90e99f0746540a6631f55">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The contents of nested tables are no longer going through upcasting. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8393">#8393</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/270a6c3023a5126af61e37cfb2795a9caca13c85">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The table properties balloon should always follow the table when the alignment changes. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6223">#6223</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/0fa28f34cd877c84b94c55e424c19e6a26e35dff">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-theme-lark" rel="nofollow">theme-lark</a></strong>: The HTML embed text in a disabled input in Safari on iOS should have the same color as in other browsers. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8320">#8320</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/521847caab1f8573e6b2e56e71c464e9cc392777">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-theme-lark" rel="nofollow">theme-lark</a></strong>: The dropdown button should not have an inner shadow in active state. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8699">#8699</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/395d954619afaf20c6f9f2caf2059490c9c62452">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: The "Show more items" toolbar button tooltip should not overflow the editor. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8655">#8655</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/6175a207162f0355e446ef5dc59f1d1a03d4a7d2">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: The <code>'-'</code> (new line) divider should not be rendered when grouping is enabled. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8582">#8582</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/c5e54ced16b81a2b1c0768515883ee17f02d32ac">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-word-count" rel="nofollow">word-count</a></strong>: The word count feature should consider a string with a special character as a single word. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8078">#8078</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/c2183287394cee2249da8210cee73a64be916aae">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-other-changes-11" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#other-changes-11"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Other changes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Optimized the <code>Model#insertContent()</code> function to use as few operations as possible to reduce the time needed to handle pasting large content into the editor. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8054">#8054</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/715">#715</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/d97206cc1e423043e1cbe012a1b8f6b2083cc092">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Improved performance of the <code>Differ#getChanges()</code> function. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8188">#8188</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/98644f6f78621e6160edf4d7afe73867a369dc2f">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-export-word" rel="nofollow">export-word</a></strong>: The timezone option should be passed to the Export to Word converter.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-embed" rel="nofollow">html-embed</a></strong>: A placeholder should be displayed if the HTML snippet is not previewable or empty. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8435">#8435</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/a35881b12de63adf41529eb3c208fa26a2c170a7">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Improved how the fake selection marker for the link UI is created. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8092">#8092</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/be55f919d3076602947019205538e6d1db86a8aa">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-mention" rel="nofollow">mention</a></strong>: The conversion API reference is no longer passed down to the attribute properties. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8370">#8370</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/eb160780717e88e28c5efe27b83c6440dbbed979">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Updated translations. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/068b10be37629fc819ef7e601691c0b597dfab51">commit</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/c7d16b67fdb0a51f4e953aaa9e7a867b1d83fb2c">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>

<h2 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-2400-2020-12-07" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#2400-2020-12-07"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/compare/v23.1.0...v24.0.0">24.0.0</a> (2020-12-07)</h2>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-release-highlights-12" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#release-highlights-12"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Release highlights</h3>
<p dir="auto">We are happy to announce the release of CKEditor 5 v24.0.0.</p>
<p dir="auto">This release brings some new features:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/1098">Accessible, Material design like input labels</a>.</li>
<li>The long-awaited <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6146">multiline toolbar</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8236">Inserting images by pasting the URL directly into the editor</a>.</li>
<li>The <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/714"><code>editor.focus()</code> method</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">There were also some important bug fixes:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues?q=is%3Aissue+milestone%3A%22iteration+38%22+-label%3Atype%3Adocs+-label%3Atype%3Atask+sort%3Aupdated-desc+label%3Apackage%3Alist">Multiple issues with the lists and list styles</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues?q=is%3Aissue+milestone%3A%22iteration+38%22+-label%3Atype%3Adocs+-label%3Atype%3Atask+sort%3Aupdated-desc+label%3Apackage%3Ahtml-embed">Follow-ups to the HMTL embed feature</a> introduced in the previous release.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8158">Pasting plain text on link no longer breaks the link</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7978">Select All does select all now</a> - including tables and block quotes.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8233">The <code>supportAllValues</code> option in the font feature now works with nested elements</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Please note that there are some <strong>major breaking changes</strong> in this release. Be sure to review them before upgrading.</p>
<p dir="auto">Read more in the blog post: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/CKEditor-5-v24.0.0-with-multiline-toolbar-and-accessible-input-labels/" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/blog/CKEditor-5-v24.0.0-with-multiline-toolbar-and-accessible-input-labels/</a></p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-collaboration-features-2" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#collaboration-features-2"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Collaboration features</h3>
<p dir="auto">The CKEditor 5 Collaboration features changelog can be found here: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/collaboration/changelog" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/collaboration/changelog</a>.</p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-6" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-6"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MAJOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The <code>DocumentSelection#markers</code> collection will not include all markers by default. Use <code>DocumentSelection#observeMarkers()</code> to register that the given marker should be put in the <code>#markers</code> collection when the document selection is placed inside it.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-theme-lark" rel="nofollow">theme-lark</a></strong>: The look and behavior of the <code>LabeledFieldView</code> UI component (used for displaying fields across the project) have changed. This may require changes in your integration if it customizes the <code>.ck-labeled-field-view</code> selector (or its internals).</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-8" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-8"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MINOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The parameters of the image utility function <code>insertImage()</code> parameters have changed. The removed <code>writer</code> instance is no longer needed. Additionally, you can specify <code>insertPosition</code> as an optional parameter.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-features-12" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#features-12"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Features</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-build-decoupled-document" rel="nofollow">build-decoupled-document</a></strong>: Added new features to the build configuration: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/features/horizontal-line.html" rel="nofollow">horizontal line</a>, <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/features/page-break.html" rel="nofollow">page break</a>, <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/features/remove-format.html" rel="nofollow">remove formatting</a>, and <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/features/special-characters.html" rel="nofollow">special characters</a>). See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6146">#6146</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/70157aec7c0ec62b63a51f6bb20764afad443637">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-core" rel="nofollow">core</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>focus()</code> method in the base <code>Editor</code> class. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/714">#714</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/dea805153299404a130dcc12aa855cba922a2e86">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>DataProcessor#registerRawContentMatcher()</code> API that marks content sections which contain arbitrary character data and should not be parsed during the conversion. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8323">#8323</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b8538dea19326a04ed0ff4d8b0ab346f6be8fc08">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Support for inserting images by pasting an image URL directly into the editor. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8236">#8236</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/908a35ac381c852c466f6144ac25f21f0d5af877">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-paste-from-office" rel="nofollow">paste-from-office</a></strong>: Support for preserving the list styles while pasting from Word. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8080">#8080</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/2c03820644f83b2fe247d27fc2c645a5d497b4fd">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-theme-lark" rel="nofollow">theme-lark</a></strong>: Added two new tooltip positions (east and west) in the <code>TooltipView</code> class and the <code>Button</code> interface (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8340">#8340</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ff62e50b9ef3aee69748cb42c7cc1fe51c76dd1d">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-theme-lark" rel="nofollow">theme-lark</a></strong>: Implemented a toolbar configuration that allows rendering toolbar items in multiple rows. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6146">#6146</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/70157aec7c0ec62b63a51f6bb20764afad443637">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-theme-lark" rel="nofollow">theme-lark</a></strong>: Added styles for a new south-east position of the <code>TooltipView</code> (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8335">#8335</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/1ac756a9829055f9508ae07932d5d12cd672851f">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: Added support for a new south-east position of the <code>TooltipView</code> (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8335">#8335</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/1ac756a9829055f9508ae07932d5d12cd672851f">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Made the input labels accessible across the editor UI. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/1098">#1098</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8242">#8242</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/407a8a7b1d078644daf318e97e6792dce8d73063">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-bug-fixes-12" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bug-fixes-12"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Bug fixes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-basic-styles" rel="nofollow">basic-styles</a></strong>: The code style should not be copied to a new line on pressing the <kbd>Enter</kbd> key. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8144">#8144</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/000aeb69672115cf7aaeaee23125e4ac0255966e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-clipboard" rel="nofollow">clipboard</a></strong>: Pasting plain text inside a link or a restricted editing editable region will no longer break them. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8158">#8158</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8d376fd50be366a67f39423ee8603506a8aa530d">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: <code>DomConverter</code> will not trim whitespaces in nodes that are siblings to inline raw content elements (e.g. MathML). Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5870">#5870</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b8538dea19326a04ed0ff4d8b0ab346f6be8fc08">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The select all command should include all selectable elements in the content. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7978">#7978</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/e9d7d17e78a3686a7e3442729f07367b35246e09">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The editor should not crash when selecting an image from bottom to top. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7892">#7892</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5dd05b9304e030ff32c34209020b21113f7146dc">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-font" rel="nofollow">font</a></strong>: Fixed the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_font_fontsize-FontSizeConfig.html#member-supportAllValues" rel="nofollow"><code>fontSize.supportAllValues</code></a> configuration for the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_font_fontsize-FontSize.html" rel="nofollow"><code>FontSize</code></a> plugin to work with nested elements. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8233">#8233</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/180415ec0ab0acd3be47b5d63d048bb2d436c35c">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-embed" rel="nofollow">html-embed</a></strong>: Tooltips in HTML embeds should not affect the editing root size or scrollbar. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8340">#8340</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ff62e50b9ef3aee69748cb42c7cc1fe51c76dd1d">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-embed" rel="nofollow">html-embed</a></strong>: HTML embed editing UI should not be broken when the editor uses an RTL language. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8335">#8335</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/1ac756a9829055f9508ae07932d5d12cd672851f">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-embed" rel="nofollow">html-embed</a></strong>: The editor will not crash after inserting broken HTML. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8323">#8323</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b8538dea19326a04ed0ff4d8b0ab346f6be8fc08">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-embed" rel="nofollow">html-embed</a></strong>: Fixed saving the widget content after it lost the selection. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8328">#8328</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/2151b577f64a65468413ce0b2a80a72b7b6f45d6">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-embed" rel="nofollow">html-embed</a></strong>: The save button will now reflect the command state. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8357">#8357</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b2805dd9c2bf3d0a6c51b8d266b0e76ade06c33b">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-embed" rel="nofollow">html-embed</a></strong>: The editing root should remain focused when saving changes in the HTML embed widget. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8318">#8318</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/2d8207a9dcecd3693f8204e92456874b2104e329">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-embed" rel="nofollow">html-embed</a></strong>: Floated images are now properly displayed around HTML embeds. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8332">#8332</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/985334c96066a30fd6adfca6aec86b6829bba7f8">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Do not attach the image resizer to images inside the HTML embed preview. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8433">#8433</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/f10ee939bd128d19b42b229ac4fc3fe19c7dcb2a">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-indent" rel="nofollow">indent</a></strong>: The block indent feature will now work with custom headings. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8177">#8177</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/23c64f5abc8e3f4ed76a1bc9266aee947f2694ad">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: The editor should not crash when inserting a link after another link with the same URL. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8210">#8210</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/81b8dc6cefb6311cdcae6dc4b19971905e3768c6">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Fixed the unlink command for a selection spreading over 3+ blocks. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8030">#8030</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/3d86dadc4db52fde9a7e80c130f1fc67e49c73b2">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Fixed a quick image flicker of the image resize frame when inserting an image. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8088">#8088</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/021227d3ccce8b3ed7114bbb22e99f67bd3fa66e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: List styles will be inherited correctly when pasting a list into another list. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8160">#8160</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5dd14a38a4c403e312681cc129deac78cf325629">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-paste-from-office" rel="nofollow">paste-from-office</a></strong>: Improved the mechanism that detects nested lists when pasting from Word. In some scenarios, pasting nested lists could produce invalid results in the editor. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7805">#7805</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/be5b989419930b3a45349494d7a1874801bf1dd4">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-theme-lark" rel="nofollow">theme-lark</a></strong>: The HTML embed editing UI should not be broken when the editor uses an RTL language (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8335">#8335</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/1ac756a9829055f9508ae07932d5d12cd672851f">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: A toolbar with grouped items should wrap to keep items visible in the viewport. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5586">#5586</a> . (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/65bc73d9ad08ed2ff4e6b3c6d2d7283c66ea6a58">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-undo" rel="nofollow">undo</a></strong>: Fixed restoring selection on undo for some scenarios when some selection ranges are in the graveyard after restoring them. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/772f45dd1c9ce62e81466e7494e7e04ee70c0e50">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-utils" rel="nofollow">utils</a></strong>: Fixed a memory leak in <code>EventEmitterMixin</code>. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8480">#8480</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/6a7f3816c80c8c988ce0483530f1b114b36c895d">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Fixed building documentation on Windows. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7212">#7212</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/c7f69dde00bf69816d07d19e175e9cddf3e34b5c">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>

<h2 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-2310-2020-10-29" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#2310-2020-10-29"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/compare/v23.0.0...v23.1.0">23.1.0</a> (2020-10-29)</h2>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-release-highlights-13" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#release-highlights-13"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Release highlights</h3>
<p dir="auto">We are happy to announce the release of CKEditor 5 v23.1.0.</p>
<p dir="auto">This release introduces a new <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/features/html-embed.html" rel="nofollow">HTML embed feature</a> and adds the list style feature to the document editor build.</p>
<p dir="auto">It also comes with new API features:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/4600">The <code>data-cke-ignore-events</code> attribute in view element</a> that prevents CKEditor from handling events fired in this element.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7956">The <code>triggerBy</code> option</a> that triggers element re-render.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Other than that, this release brings several bug fixes, to name a few:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8098">Unsupported element causes a JavaScript error instead of being filtered out</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8145"><kbd>Backspace</kbd> does not remove all blocks in rare cases</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8262">List conversion throws an error if the list element is surrounded by raw text nodes</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7896">Opening the upload panel should focus the URL input</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7917">Validation for empty URL in the "Insert image via URL" dropdown</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7488">URLs with a <code>%</code> character are not transformed into media embeds</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Please note that there are some <strong>minor breaking changes</strong>. Be sure to review them before upgrading.</p>
<p dir="auto">Read more in the blog post: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/CKEditor-5-v23.1.0-with-raw-HTML-embedding-and-reconversion-API/" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/blog/CKEditor-5-v23.1.0-with-raw-HTML-embedding-and-reconversion-API/</a></p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-collaboration-features-3" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#collaboration-features-3"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Collaboration features</h3>
<p dir="auto">The CKEditor 5 Collaboration features changelog can be found here: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/collaboration/changelog" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/collaboration/changelog</a>.</p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-9" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-9"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MINOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Removed the <code>ensureParagraphInTableCell()</code> converter that corrected the model state after the conversion process. Now the model will be fixed (if needed) by the post-fixer (<code>injectTableCellParagraphPostFixer()</code>).</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-utils" rel="nofollow">utils</a></strong>: The <code>attachLinkToDocumentation()</code> helper was removed. To log errors with an attached documentation link to the console, use <code>logWarning()</code> and <code>logError()</code>.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-features-13" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#features-13"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Features</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-build-decoupled-document" rel="nofollow">build-decoupled-document</a></strong>: Added the list style feature to the document editor build. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7941">#7941</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/606a44b1575a5ba6c7be7b0e2c89907d151c2742">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Elements with the <code>data-cke-ignore-events</code> attribute will not propagate their events to the CKEditor 5 API. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/4600">#4600</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/04207f93f00a668bbe031d70ae7230f892428115">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Introduced an automatic model-to-view reconversion by defining the <code>triggerBy</code> option for the <code>elementToElement()</code> conversion helper. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7956">#7956</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/a7c99732fd63008ada4f13c187df552a989291e1">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-html-embed" rel="nofollow">html-embed</a></strong>: Introduced the HTML embed feature. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8204">#8204</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b529537086966ac908a163bf9373d67d43383586">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-bug-fixes-13" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bug-fixes-13"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Bug fixes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: <code>Model#deleteContent()</code> should properly remove content with multiple blocks selected. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8145">#8145</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/c4b3182722a8eea68d00b0250c8ac9388723a1b5">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Removed focus outline in the "insert image via URL" form. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7973">#7973</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/d3975f8436cee3f0e4c4cd39b4ee8c7816f15784">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The insert button in the insert image dropdown is now disabled when the URL input is empty. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7917">#7917</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/608baa9be5a1c8ae5600e8df9627c4f5b2cecef7">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The URL input field is now focused when the image dropdown is opened. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7896">#7896</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/25b3aec03dae39cfd68b039b6704ef2670ccbfda">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Improved the look of link balloon button separators on mobiles. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7704">#7704</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/6aecaf89c656f2fff126185833b8030618109f7d">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Pressing <kbd>Ctrl/Cmd</kbd>+<kbd>K</kbd> when <code>LinkCommand</code> is disabled no longer shows the link UI. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7919">#7919</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/242d21c67ecf71781beae4494472538d78c9636d">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: The autolink feature now uses <code>link.defaultProtocol</code> if set. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8079">#8079</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/9a9f9c3671f1427c0c32784e43a3b1e5c0a5e6b7">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: List conversion does not throw an error if the list element is being surrounded by raw text nodes. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8262">#8262</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/e8b6f519d40bb0f18de988c82e72f023fba2ddfe">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-media-embed" rel="nofollow">media-embed</a></strong>: Disabled the save button in the insert media dropdown when the input is empty. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7917">#7917</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/608baa9be5a1c8ae5600e8df9627c4f5b2cecef7">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-media-embed" rel="nofollow">media-embed</a></strong>: URLs with the <code>%</code> character are now allowed for embedding media. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7488">#7488</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5f4c9b581c36bbe0c47782039f6d9376e408d638">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-media-embed" rel="nofollow">media-embed</a></strong>: Enabled the media embed command when the selected media is in a table cell. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7604">#7604</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/f36fcba2cfde0d97c481bbedbbfe6b3d49f0b74a">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Pasting nested tables with content unsupported by the editor elements no longer throws an exception. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8098">#8098</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/c8e3a9480fbe2d638ac986f8d723aa89e62a82bc">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>

<li>Optimized icons. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/dfc73c9875768d09ad1a64d68ec14ec15f9b0f66">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Updated translations. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/6ec37b150ba09c3ad50a8e52fa1b594d58ae6d0d">commit</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/445944d9b084c38a7366ce714017af8bea0ae70d">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>

<h2 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-2300-2020-09-29" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#2300-2020-09-29"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/compare/v22.0.0...v23.0.0">23.0.0</a> (2020-09-29)</h2>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-release-highlights-14" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#release-highlights-14"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Release highlights</h3>
<p dir="auto">We are happy to announce the release of CKEditor 5 v23.0.0.</p>
<p dir="auto">This release brings the new <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/How-to-create-ready-to-print-documents-with-page-structure-in-WYSIWYG-editor---CKEditor-5-pagination-feature/" rel="nofollow">pagination feature</a>.</p>
<p dir="auto">Other than that, we focused on bug fixes and stability improvements. Some highlights are listed below:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues?q=is%3Aissue+milestone%3A%22iteration+36%22+label%3Atype%3Abug+label%3Apackage%3Alist">Five bug fixes for list and list style plugins</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7890">The "upload image via URL" feature was extracted into a separate image insert plugin</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7799">Improvements for pasting as plain text using <kbd>Ctrl/Cmd</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>V</kbd></a>.</li>
<li>Fixed <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7926">a case where the link balloon toolbar would be mispositioned</a> in some rare cases.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Please note that there are some <strong>major breaking changes</strong>. Be sure to review them before upgrading.</p>
<p dir="auto">Read more in the blog post: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/CKEditor-5-v23.0.0-with-pagination-feature-list-styles-and-improved-image-upload/" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/blog/CKEditor-5-v23.0.0-with-pagination-feature-list-styles-and-improved-image-upload/</a></p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-collaboration-features-4" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#collaboration-features-4"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Collaboration features</h3>
<p dir="auto">The CKEditor 5 Collaboration features changelog can be found here: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/collaboration/changelog" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/collaboration/changelog</a>.</p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-7" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-7"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MAJOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: In order to use the "insert image via URL" feature you now need to load the <code>ImageInsert</code> plugin and use the <code>imageInsert</code> button instead of the <code>imageUpload</code> button that implemented this functionality previously.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-10" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-10"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MINOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-clipboard" rel="nofollow">clipboard</a></strong>: When pasting plain text, each double line break is now treated as a paragraph separator, while a single line break is converted into a soft break. Formerly, every single line break was treated as paragraph separation.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-features-14" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#features-14"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Features</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-clipboard" rel="nofollow">clipboard</a></strong>: Improved line to paragraph/soft break retention when pasting as plain text. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7884">#7884</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/a4b89965e8b156ee4ed67df9d4a634c0e6deac01">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-utils" rel="nofollow">utils</a></strong>: Added a user-agent check for the Blink engine to the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_utils_env-env.html" rel="nofollow"><code>env</code></a> module. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/a5a4b933e8ecef2b25ddbf03d371b89f26490025">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Introduced the <code>PastePlainText</code> feature that detects pasting with <kbd>Ctrl/cmd</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>V</kbd> keystroke. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7799">#7799</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ab7bce94ebb7b6d59c5f3ea2d9433f71ddd864d2">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-bug-fixes-14" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bug-fixes-14"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Bug fixes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-clipboard" rel="nofollow">clipboard</a></strong>: The editor now properly places soft breaks in the plain text clipboard data representation. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8045">#8045</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/92ace8d7f3abe4c8247ca18697984eb538f3f5ec">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The <code>model.History#getOperations()</code> method was returning incorrect values if history had operations with negative version numbers or version numbers differing by more than one. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8143">#8143</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/3433e9a8ad64cc971cdfa4658a84585b4e23f19e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Aligned and fixed the styling for the split button in the <code>ImageInsert</code> dropdown. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7986">#7986</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7927">#7927</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4671ed10a4af4c507abd594414771b714ff31cf7">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Manual decorators will no longer be corrupted by the link image plugin. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7975">#7975</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/73eacd641f38ee261cd43ddfdf98df5e22eb2fdd">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Prevented throwing an error when creating a link from a multi-block selection. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7907">#7907</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/eb92cfb7377fa066a4cb08163ade33a73639aab1">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Pressing the <kbd>Enter</kbd> key should not throw an error when a non-collapsed selection ends with a valid URL. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7983">#7983</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/bcf3af6bee1edbd3a6d0c6874e0ad0518f73f518">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: The link balloon positioning should be correct when the selection is collapsed in some rare cases. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7926">#7926</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b532a8ec55e1e1506b6f8030f944559b1cf0761d">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: The list style plugin will no longer cause the editor to crash when indenting a list item that is the last element in the editor. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8072">#8072</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/3e6ea99fe28225c52092b621c3593748bb1c168e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: Undo will restore a proper value of the <code>list-style-type</code> attribute in the view element after undoing list merge. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7930">#7930</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/3e6ea99fe28225c52092b621c3593748bb1c168e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: Fixed a bug that prevented using the same list style for nested lists. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8081">#8081</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/3e6ea99fe28225c52092b621c3593748bb1c168e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: The <code>listStyle</code> attribute should be inherited when inserting or replacing a <code>listItem</code> with the same list type (the <code>listType</code> attribute for the inserted or modified item is equal to the next or previous sibling list). Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7932">#7932</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/03bf7211b1efc94ba087750f77006d534fdbaa5d">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: When removing the content between two lists items, these lists will be merged into a single list. The second list should adjust its <code>listStyle</code> attribute to the first list. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7879">#7879</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/7aa952823a8b182dc41075fa8cf4cc3a452eb78b">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-paste-from-office" rel="nofollow">paste-from-office</a></strong>: Fixed pasting a list with an empty item from Google Docs. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7958">#7958</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ebf6bb798cb274c840df86de073cf511c66d876c">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-other-changes-14" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#other-changes-14"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Other changes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor-cloud-services-core" rel="nofollow">cloud-services-core</a></strong>: Change the token refreshing mechanism to depend on the token expiration time. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/501490a5729c413ee00311fe3c9a965fab2bb2ad">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The <code>config.image.upload.panel.items</code> option does not need to be set anymore in order to show the "insert image via URL form". It is enough to load the new <code>ImageInsert</code> plugin and use the new <code>imageInsert</code> button. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/8034">#8034</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/48a9e943122e4cdd0e2647f03ebc7b17c402710e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Introduced <code>ImageInsert</code> as a standalone plugin that contains the <code>ImageUpload</code> functionality. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7890">#7890</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4671ed10a4af4c507abd594414771b714ff31cf7">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The <code>ImageUploadPanelView</code> form label should change depending on whether the image is selected or not. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7878">#7878</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/288fb97e00181a130dd2833d6e3aa74bdab5b7cc">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: The link plugin now comes with the autolink feature enabled by default. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7682">#7682</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/c9533f1752057fd833998a356282f8a625f4e39c">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-theme-lark" rel="nofollow">theme-lark</a></strong>: Balloon panel arrows pointing down should have realistic shadows.
