<h2 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-2200-2020-08-26" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#2200-2020-08-26"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/compare/v21.0.0...v22.0.0">22.0.0</a> (2020-08-26)</h2>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-release-highlights-15" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#release-highlights-15"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Release highlights</h3>
<p dir="auto">We are happy to announce the release of CKEditor 5 v22.0.0.</p>
<p dir="auto">This release brings a few new features:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>The <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7801">list style plugin</a>.</li>
<li>The <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6007">Markdown plugin</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7794">Inserting image with URL</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7336">A new event-based conversion API</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Please note that there are some <strong>major breaking changes</strong>. Be sure to review them before upgrading.</p>
<p dir="auto">Read more in the blog post: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v22.0.0-with-inserting-images-via-url-list-styles-and-markdown-plugin/" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v22.0.0-with-inserting-images-via-url-list-styles-and-markdown-plugin/</a></p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-collaboration-features-5" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#collaboration-features-5"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Collaboration features</h3>
<p dir="auto">The CKEditor 5 Collaboration Features changelog can be found here: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/collaboration/changelog" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/collaboration/changelog</a>.</p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-8" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-8"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MAJOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The <code>view</code> and <code>model</code> callbacks of all one-way converter helpers (such as <code>editor.conversion.for( 'upcast' ).elementToElement()</code>, <code>editor.conversion.for( 'downcast' ).attributeToElement()</code>) now take the <code>conversionApi</code> as their second parameter. Previously, the second parameter was the downcast or upcast writer instance. Now, the writer needs to be retrieved from <code>conversionApi.writer</code>.<br><br>
An example migration snippet can be found in a <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7334#issuecomment-670450941">GitHub comment</a>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The <code>config.view</code> parameter for upcast element-to-element conversion helper configurations is now mandatory. You can retain the previous "catch-all" behavior for the upcast converter using the <code>config.view = /[\s\S]+/</code> value.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-11" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-11"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MINOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The <code>tableCell</code> model element brought by the <code>TableEditing</code> plugin is no longer an object (<code>SchemaItemDefinition#isObject</code>) in the <code>Schema</code> but a selectable (<code>SchemaItemDefinition#isSelectable</code>). Please update your integration code accordingly. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6432">#6432</a>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: It is now possible to override existing components when <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_ui_componentfactory-ComponentFactory.html#function-add" rel="nofollow">adding new ones</a> to the <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_ui_componentfactory-ComponentFactory.html" rel="nofollow">component factory</a> (previously an error was thrown). See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7803">#7803</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-features-15" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#features-15"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Features</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-clipboard" rel="nofollow">clipboard</a></strong>: Pasting a plain text will inherit selection attributes. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/1006">#1006</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/2a163e389a6b22b1e5590fe6a2ed8204387d4350">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Options passed to <code>Editor#getData()</code> and <code>DataController#get()</code> are now available in downcast conversion under the <code>conversionApi.options</code> object. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7628">#7628</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/0a5d07e3c9a5cef51ebfb4a5819b5118ad9ae115">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Added the conversion API to upcast and downcast helpers. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7334">#7334</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/16c971198971b770d4e7aff4ea8eec7a88a6fcdb">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>SchemaItemDefinition#isSelectable</code> and <code>SchemaItemDefinition#isContent</code> properties. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6432">#6432</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/579c1c851ca33c78de60c98777684f8ee5ceb26e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Introduced new upcast <code>ConversionApi</code> helper methods: <code>conversionApi.safeInsert()</code> and <code>conversionApi.updateConversionResult()</code>. The new methods are intended to simplify writing event-based element-to-element converters. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7336">#7336</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8d84af1610089ea7916401ecf6f636c9d330b459">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Introduced the insert image via URL feature. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7794">#7794</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/bb00c23f6234751666e859e6e5d7e909f194e375">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-indent" rel="nofollow">indent</a></strong>: Block indentation is now recognized as a formatting attribute. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/2358">#2358</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/6b2cc25dd717eb22caf7189d8cf33511397179c0">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: Introduced the list style feature that allows customizing the list marker. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7801">#7801</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/137dd2856aecaa8f9c023e6ca9d01592707137a0">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-markdown-gfm" rel="nofollow">markdown-gfm</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>Markdown</code> plugin. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6007">#6007</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/7cd5fc198e1977ecefbf0e455f4b514b467e7775">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-markdown-gfm" rel="nofollow">markdown-gfm</a></strong>: The Markdown data processor was revamped and got the dependencies updated. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5988">#5988</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/3881349eae0c9a862e76487f8eb117d6ca3e38b0">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-utils" rel="nofollow">utils</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>Rect#getBoundingRect()</code> method that returns a <code>Rect</code> instance containing all the rectangles passed as an argument. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7858">#7858</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ccfaf5e54854cc8a62ebbc005e35676f77be37c4">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-utils" rel="nofollow">utils</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>passive</code> option support in the <code>DomEmitterMixin#listenTo()</code> method. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7828">#7828</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/a7ef65c8246b9591a9a2081cfb19266de0c6194b">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: Keyboard vertical navigation in text lines next to objects should move the caret to the position closest to the object. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7630">#7630</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/7984a14a411416634d64d405da2d6d18a314e947">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-bug-fixes-15" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bug-fixes-15"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Bug fixes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Upcast conversion will now try to wrap text or inline elements in a paragraph in a place where they are not allowed but a paragraph is allowed. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7753">#7753</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6698">#6698</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5e857fd0ec6f4dc9e86dec0bf9c5b87289eedf8b">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The selection will no longer inherit attributes from an empty inline element. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7459">#7459</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/1ddb955cc667ad16b41521762f77b95382f467da">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Fixed a case where the link balloon would point to an invalid place after the browser scroll or resize. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7705">#7705</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5158209e2a39884a3015e317f17f33a340e2502d">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: Dropdown panels from the editor's main toolbar should always float above the contextual balloons from the editor's content. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7874">#7874</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/57d3f02958ad32b8c774dbdc38e1a1210e75af1f">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: Balloon toolbar should reposition and ungroup items correctly when the window resizes. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6444">#6444</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/32523780fa27146d4f74b538af4831d8b9683bd9">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-utils" rel="nofollow">utils</a></strong>: The <code>Rect</code> utility returns wrong sizes in case of a sequenced range. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7838">#7838</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ccfaf5e54854cc8a62ebbc005e35676f77be37c4">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-other-changes-15" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#other-changes-15"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Other changes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-markdown-gfm" rel="nofollow">markdown-gfm</a></strong>: Upgraded to Marked v1.1.1. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7850">#7850</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/d6c8731a33f3402b8bd71b987b762116efd3898a">commit</a>)</p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-mention" rel="nofollow">mention</a></strong>: The <kbd>Space</kbd> key will not confirm a mention selection from the list. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6394">#6394</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/a8d41ecbbeb5d36694ba74d0391805cfaa5214e7">commit</a>)</p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-remove-format" rel="nofollow">remove-format</a></strong>: Block formatting should be removed if the selection is inside that block. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/6b2cc25dd717eb22caf7189d8cf33511397179c0">commit</a>)</p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The <code>tableCell</code> model element brought by the <code>TableEditing</code> plugin is no longer an object (<code>SchemaItemDefinition#isObject</code>) in the <code>Schema</code> but a selectable (<code>SchemaItemDefinition#isSelectable</code>) (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6432">#6432</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/579c1c851ca33c78de60c98777684f8ee5ceb26e">commit</a>)</p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Pressing <kbd>Shift</kbd>+<kbd>Tab</kbd> in the first table cell now selects the entire table. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7535">#7535</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/3064c64733145b40290480f3299e168b74380d04">commit</a>)</p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: The <code>clickOutsideHandler()</code> function will take into consideration that the editor can be placed in a shadow root while detecting a click. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7743">#7743</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/2dc026409051828618c274ae62ce331fe05681fe">commit</a>)</p>
<p dir="auto">Thanks to <a href="https://github.com/ywsang">@ywsang</a>.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto">Updated translations. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/fb260219a41e9342646878e619ddac17f680eabe">commit</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/090c9f03d937998046d6fd27b6bbd1eaf101a8a0">commit</a>)</p>
</li>
</ul>

<h2 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-2100-2020-07-28" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#2100-2020-07-28"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/compare/v20.0.0...v21.0.0">21.0.0</a> (2020-07-28)</h2>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-release-highlights-16" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#release-highlights-16"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Release highlights</h3>
<p dir="auto">We are happy to announce the release of CKEditor 5 v21.0.0.</p>
<p dir="auto">This release packs quite a few all-around improvements, including:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5201">A convenient UI for changing the image width to a predefined size</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/4715">Autolinking URLs and e-mails in the editor content</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6722">Distinguishing between the inside and the outside of <code>&lt;code&gt;</code></a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/4762">Better experience when replacing (typing over) a link text</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">We have also fixed a handful of bugs, for example:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>Calling the <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/4060"><code>editor.setData()</code> method will now also clear the undo stack</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5779">Linking to a part of a to-do list item</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7519">Automatic link decorators in case of a linked image</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Finally, we also took care of some of the developer experience-oriented improvements:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7556">We changed marker conversion so that it does not break the HTML structure in some cases</a>.</li>
<li>Introduced a new <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_engine_view_rawelement-RawElement.html" rel="nofollow"><code>RawElement</code></a> class to make it simpler to <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/4469">implement features like "embedding raw HTML"</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Please note that there are some <strong>major breaking changes</strong>. Be sure to review them before upgrading.</p>
<p dir="auto">Read more in the blog post: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v21.0.0-with-autolink-and-export-to-word-released/" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/blog/ckeditor-5-v21.0.0-with-autolink-and-export-to-word-released/</a></p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-collaboration-features-6" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#collaboration-features-6"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Collaboration features</h3>
<p dir="auto">The CKEditor 5 Collaboration features changelog can be found here: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/collaboration/changelog" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/collaboration/changelog</a>.</p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-9" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-9"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MAJOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>The <code>editor.setData()</code> method now clears the undo and redo stacks.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_engine_model_text-Text.html#function-is" rel="nofollow"><code>Text#is()</code></a> and <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_engine_model_textproxy-TextProxy.html#function-is" rel="nofollow"><code>TextProxy#is()</code></a> methods (in the model and the view) now expect to be called with <code>'$text'</code> instead of <code>'text'</code> and <code>'$textProxy'</code> instead of <code>'textProxy'</code>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The <code>is()</code> method (e.g. <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_engine_model_element-Element.html#function-is" rel="nofollow"><code>Element#is()</code></a>, <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_engine_model_text-Text.html#function-is" rel="nofollow"><code>Text#is()</code></a>, <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_engine_view_attributeelement-AttributeElement.html#function-is" rel="nofollow"><code>AttributeElement#is()</code></a> or <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_engine_view_containerelement-ContainerElement.html#function-is" rel="nofollow"><code>ContainerElement#is()</code></a>) in both the model and the view no longer treats the first argument as an element name. To check the element name, use the second argument instead (<code>node.is( 'element', 'paragraph' )</code> instead of <code>node.is( 'paragraph' )</code>).</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The marker-to-data conversion was revamped. The data format changed, the new conversion helpers were introduced and a new rule was implemented that a comma (<code>,</code>) is not allowed in the marker name. See the GitHub issue for a <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7556#issuecomment-665579653">walkthrough and example migration path</a>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The <code>DomConverter#getParentUIElement()</code> method was renamed to <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/api/module_engine_view_domconverter-DomConverter.html#function-getHostViewElement" rel="nofollow"><code>DomConverter#getHostViewElement()</code></a> because now it supports both <code>UIElement</code> and <code>RawElement</code> (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/4469">#4469</a>).</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-12" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-12"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MINOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The <code>bindTwoStepCaretToAttribute()</code> utility function was removed. Use <code>editor.plugins.get( TwoStepCaretMovement ).registerAttribute()</code> instead.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The <code>findAncestor()</code> utility function was removed.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The parameters of <code>TableUtils#createTable()</code> have changed. Use the <code>options</code> object to pass the number of <code>rows</code> and <code>columns</code>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The <code>removeEmptyRows()</code> and <code>removeEmptyRowsColumns()</code> utility functions do not require the <code>batch</code> parameter anymore.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The <code>downcastTableHeadingRowsChange()</code> downcast converter was removed. It is no longer possible to override the <code>headingRows</code> attribute change in a single converter. This behavior can be customized using the table downcast converter. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7601">#7601</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-features-16" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#features-16"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Features</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-autoformat" rel="nofollow">autoformat</a></strong>: Block autoformat can also be triggered in blocks other than a paragraph. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6170">#6170</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5866d4199dad1b70b5329c83dd4b3974716f04a5">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-autoformat" rel="nofollow">autoformat</a></strong>: Enabled the autoformatting feature also for blocks that are not empty. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5866d4199dad1b70b5329c83dd4b3974716f04a5">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Implemented the view <code>RawElement</code>. Added the <code>DowncastWriter#createRawElement()</code> method. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/4469">#4469</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/bff38e366517a2801ffdd136bcff3afbfe671fd6">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The <code>DataController#set()</code> method is now decorated so plugins can listen to <code>editor.setData()</code> calls. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4a12d38094803f62d351e467a37ecba2b9c957fd">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Introduced new marker conversion helpers that produce semantic HTML data output. See <code>DowncastHelpers#markerToData()</code> and <code>UpcastHelpers#dataToMarker()</code>. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7556">#7556</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b68d310d7ca779c2e6da5072e46fb5a13fb1e4f0">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Added model <code>Position#findAncestor()</code> and <code>Element#findAncestor()</code> methods. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/3233">#3233</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/a349af57c6a0ceeea1f7cfebf28a138065f15189">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Changed the visibility scope of <code>Mapper#findPositionIn()</code> from <code>private</code> to <code>public</code>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/3d260151f833e84cbdccc9deeff6415ae8b0c6e1">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Added the <code>Range#getJoined()</code> method for joining ranges. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/1264e63947c88123fdb2b9a8c301d100476e83a8">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Introduced the UI for manual image resizing via a dropdown or standalone buttons. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5201">#5201</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/70e0b4102511a272cfef710379e8fcde40e53ac6">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Introduced the UI for restoring the original image size.  Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5197">#5197</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/70e0b4102511a272cfef710379e8fcde40e53ac6">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Added an icon in the top-right corner of an image indicating that the image is linked. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7457">#7457</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/9887b7fcf148a72ad393c05f7278cf572c62a31a">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Typing over the selected link will not remove the link itself. Instead, the typed text will replace the link text. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/4762">#4762</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/de476bb365aabb17d81f18cbe27d47b4baa32a0d">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Added the <code>AutoLink</code> feature which replaces a plain text with a URL or e-mail address if the typed or pasted content is a link. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/4715">#4715</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/c3f307848dbefdd943376d06dcdc750e1f97eed9">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-page-break" rel="nofollow">page-break</a></strong>: Added support for pasting page breaks from Microsoft Word. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/2508">#2508</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/d921aabf5e57e0daafec4e0be086b4ff18493c2d">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Added an option to set heading rows and columns for the <code>insertTable</code> command and <code>TableUtils#createTable()</code>. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6768">#6768</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/392f61ffd1681ad6c5d7994d2339f46e317064bb">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-typing" rel="nofollow">typing</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>TwoStepCaretMovement</code> plugin. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7444">#7444</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/d40bd5832084821b54c6962462ec909e47e28168">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-utils" rel="nofollow">utils</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>Collection#addMany()</code> method for adding multiple items in a single call. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7627">#7627</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/a1f0efd3c09fe52b73dca92107ef035175704d31">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-utils" rel="nofollow">utils</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>Collection#change</code> event. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7627">#7627</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/a1f0efd3c09fe52b73dca92107ef035175704d31">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: Made it possible to disable the <code>WidgetTypeAround</code> plugin on the fly. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6774">#6774</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8cecf39f064647aa8a5c54e062f729cb981c1d67">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-bug-fixes-16" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bug-fixes-16"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Bug fixes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Fixed incorrect selection fixing in some multi-cell selection scenarios. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7659">#7659</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/43862d6e57bf4359f0d328c878b97888b6c1f9dd">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: After backspacing into a link, the caret should still stay outside the link. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7521">#7521</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/c175e1c62d358a58dddd24e048cf71aa1603781e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Manual and automatic decorators will work properly with a link on an image. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7519">#7519</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/d38b5e526709d69024df3bc1ca0ebf7cf10306b0">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Fake visual selection should not be added to the editor's data. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7614">#7614</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/84e2042181fdff0d60d97e6bcbf0a6d26a9c9f41">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: The editor should not crash on the <kbd>Enter</kbd> keypress inside a to-do list item containing soft-breaks. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5866">#5866</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6585">#6585</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/3d260151f833e84cbdccc9deeff6415ae8b0c6e1">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-list" rel="nofollow">list</a></strong>: Links inside a to-do list item should be properly converted to HTML. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5779">#5779</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/3d260151f833e84cbdccc9deeff6415ae8b0c6e1">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-media-embed" rel="nofollow">media-embed</a></strong>: The editor's placeholder should disappear after inserting media into an empty editor. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/1684">#1684</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/bff38e366517a2801ffdd136bcff3afbfe671fd6">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Pasting a table into an existing table should not set the multi-cell selection if the <code>TableSelection</code> plugin is disabled. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7486">#7486</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/e50a4e19ddbdf2e90f08da0f568916d117f1fdea">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Pasting a table into an existing table with headings should not break the table layout. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7453">#7453</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/df4485fb17e28f2ddb2d3c24253c2b23c9e11249">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The table structure should not be changed when removing the heading row. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7454">#7454</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7601">#7601</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8b83c9bcdd09e5d66c66df35fd2ee8252cecc26e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Merging cells of multiple whole rows or columns should not crash the editor. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/8b83c9bcdd09e5d66c66df35fd2ee8252cecc26e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: Removing the first hidden (grouped) toolbar button should not throw an exception. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7655">#7655</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/266dfda77fe51ca824195e22d84ad7517840777d">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-undo" rel="nofollow">undo</a></strong>: Undo/redo stacks should be cleared on <code>DataController#set()</code>. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/4060">#4060</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4a12d38094803f62d351e467a37ecba2b9c957fd">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: <code>Resizer#redraw()</code> should not change the editing view unless a different size should be set. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7633">#7633</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/978dd711c9db4022cfc89eff4a1de4f148bd65c8">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: Triple-clicking inside an image caption should not crash the editor in Firefox. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7542">#7542</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ef4b1f92dbd5a816a6be49f997726df1fd7d6eae">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: Triple-clicking a link inside an image caption should not crash the editor in Safari. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6021">#6021</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ef4b1f92dbd5a816a6be49f997726df1fd7d6eae">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: The resizing mechanism will not trigger other <code>view.Document#mousedown</code> events. Thanks to that, when resizing an image inside a cell, the mouse will not trigger the table's actions. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6755">#6755</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/27fce4e3c37bd52da6cad913defa6571618bd350">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-other-changes-16" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#other-changes-16"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Other changes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-core" rel="nofollow">core</a></strong>: Added icons that represent different sizes of an object (<code>object-size-*.svg</code>) (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7559">#7559</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/565628a6e6faa0efdeb4aee7c6a9b63e8a429dd7">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-core" rel="nofollow">core</a></strong>: The <code>Editor</code>, <code>CommandCollection</code> and <code>MultiCommand</code>'s <code>execute()</code> method will return the result of the called <code>command.execute()</code>. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7647">#7647</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/152ffc911c5345c8a5ac8536a48458847414c72c">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Changed arguments of the <code>Element#is()</code>, <code>Text#is()</code>, <code>TextProxy#is()</code>, <code>AttributeElement#is()</code>, <code>ContainerElement#is()</code>, <code>EditableElement#is()</code>, <code>EmptyElement#is()</code>, <code>UIElement#is()</code> methods and all their usages. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7608">#7608</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/dbee47989aad166fff054e55cd294446772153af">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Added the <code>model.Schema</code> instance to the downcast conversion API, available under <code>conversionApi.schema</code>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b68d310d7ca779c2e6da5072e46fb5a13fb1e4f0">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: <code>UpcastHelpers#elementToMarker()</code> is now deprecated. Use <code>UpcastHelpers#dataToMarker()</code> instead. <code>DowncastHelpers#markerToElement()</code> should only be used for editing downcast. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b68d310d7ca779c2e6da5072e46fb5a13fb1e4f0">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Table cells should not be filled with single spaces when pasting a table with empty cells. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7487">#7487</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/284c7c1b4f3fba9d4133db273706a15db7454725">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The <code>bindTwoStepCaretToAttribute()</code> engine's utility was removed. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7444">#7444</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/d40bd5832084821b54c6962462ec909e47e28168">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Allow to configure <code>ImageResize</code> in a more granular way. For example, by combining <code>ImageResizeEditing</code> with <code>ImageResizeHandles</code> or <code>ImageResizeButtons</code> to resize an image with handles or with the image toolbar UI components (dropdown or standalone buttons) respectively. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7579">#7579</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/3396d4e4c0e481b6c7927c73b88e065d61e81e49">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: Image alignment styles (<code>alignLeft</code>, <code>alignCenter</code> and <code>alignRight</code>) no longer set <code>max-width: 50%</code> of the <code>&lt;figure&gt;</code> element.  If you wish them to still do so, add <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/pull/7625/files#diff-960e3b5e24794dab54cce5dd955c2db2L11-L16">these styles</a> to your content styles. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/a4cbcf11c0f387ad815a94b6a39b8932387d9ec8">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Restoring the document selection to the ranges as they were before undoing table cells merge. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6639">#6639</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/1264e63947c88123fdb2b9a8c301d100476e83a8">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: Improved toolbar rendering time when multiple items are added or removed at once (e.g. during the editor initialization). Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6194">#6194</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/266dfda77fe51ca824195e22d84ad7517840777d">commit</a>)</li>
<li>Link's attribute element highlight is now <code>inlineHighlight()</code> - a public utility. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/fc59dc4f9790c709fda493e00e6db41f4a1ae6be">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>

<h2 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-2000-2020-06-24" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#2000-2020-06-24"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/compare/v19.1.1...v20.0.0">20.0.0</a> (2020-06-24)</h2>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-release-highlights-17" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#release-highlights-17"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Release highlights</h3>
<p dir="auto">We are happy to announce the release of CKEditor 5 v20.0.0.</p>
<p dir="auto">This release brings some highly anticipated features:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>Support for <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/702">linking images</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/407">Typing around widgets</a>.</li>
<li>An option to <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/4858">automatically set the link protocol</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/1016">Improved selection handling when working with links</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">New features were also accompanied by a set of bug fixes, to name a few:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/1239">Autoformatting will no longer change formatting when typing in an inline code</a>.</li>
<li>The editor will no longer <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5734">crash if there is an HTML comment in the source data</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto">Read more in the blog post: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/blog/CKEditor-5-v20.0.0-with-linking-images-and-multi-cell-comments-released/" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/blog/CKEditor-5-v20.0.0-with-linking-images-and-multi-cell-comments-released/</a></p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-collaboration-features-7" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#collaboration-features-7"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Collaboration features</h3>
<p dir="auto">The CKEditor 5 Collaboration features changelog can be found here: <a href="https://ckeditor.com/collaboration/changelog" rel="nofollow">https://ckeditor.com/collaboration/changelog</a>.</p>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-10" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#major-breaking-changes-ℹ️-10"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MAJOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/ckeditor5" rel="nofollow">ckeditor5</a></strong>: Node <code>&gt;=12.0.0</code> is required now.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-13" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#minor-breaking-changes-ℹ️-13"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>MINOR BREAKING CHANGES <a href="https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor5/latest/framework/guides/support/versioning-policy.html#major-and-minor-breaking-changes" rel="nofollow"><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji></a></h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The <code>TableNavigation</code> plugin was renamed to <code>TableKeyboard</code>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: The values returned by the <code>TableWalker</code> iterator have changed. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6785">#6785</a>.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: Removed the <code>getWidgetTypeAroundPositions()</code> helper since the "Insert new paragraph" buttons are now visible regardless of the widget location in the document</li>
<li>The <code>isTableWidget()</code> and <code>toTableWidget()</code> utility functions were removed.</li>
<li>The functions <code>getSelectedTableWidget()</code> and <code>getTableWidgetAncestor()</code> from <code>table/utils</code> module were moved to the <code>table/utils/widget</code> module.</li>
<li>The functions <code>getSelectedTableCells()</code>, <code>getTableCellsContainingSelection()</code>, <code>getSelectionAffectedTableCells()</code>, <code>getRowIndexes()</code>, <code>getColumnIndexes()</code>, and <code>isSelectionRectangular()</code> from <code>table/utils</code> module were moved to <code>table/utils/selection</code> module.</li>
<li>The functions <code>getVerticallyOverlappingCells()</code>, <code>splitHorizontally()</code>, <code>getHorizontallyOverlappingCells()</code>, and <code>splitVertically()</code> from <code>table/utils</code> module were moved to <code>table/utils/structure</code> module.</li>
<li>The functions <code>findAncestor()</code>, <code>updateNumericAttribute()</code>, <code>createEmptyTableCell()</code>, and <code>isHeadingColumnCell()</code> from <code>table/commands/utils</code> module were moved to <code>table/utils/common</code> module.</li>
<li>The functions <code>getSingleValue()</code> and <code>addDefaultUnitToNumericValue()</code> from <code>table/commands/utils</code> module were moved to <code>table/utils/table-properties</code> module.</li>
<li>The functions <code>cropTableToDimensions()</code> and <code>trimTableCellIfNeeded()</code> from <code>table/tableselection/croptable</code> module were moved to <code>table/utils/structure</code> module.</li>
<li>The functions <code>repositionContextualBalloon()</code>, <code>getBalloonTablePositionData()</code>, and <code>getBalloonCellPositionData()</code> from <code>table/ui/utils</code> module were moved to <code>table/utils/ui/contextualballoon</code> module.</li>
<li>The functions <code>getBorderStyleLabels()</code>, <code>getLocalizedColorErrorText()</code>, <code>getLocalizedLengthErrorText()</code>, <code>colorFieldValidator()</code>, <code>lengthFieldValidator()</code>, <code>lineWidthFieldValidator()</code>, <code>getBorderStyleDefinitions()</code>, <code>fillToolbar()</code>, and <code>getLabeledColorInputCreator()</code> from <code>table/ui/utils</code> module were moved to <code>table/utils/ui/table-properties</code> module.</li>
<li>The <code>defaultColors</code> constant from <code>table/ui/utils</code> module was moved to <code>table/utils/ui/table-properties</code> module.</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-features-17" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#features-17"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Features</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Introduced the linking images feature. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7330">#7330</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/cc0e69478e00012089857ba9ddf871aefa065677">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>LinkImageUI</code> plugin that brings a UI to wrap images in links. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7331">#7331</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/878257e43d9b0135aacec841ed5e085ca8b5c3df">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: A fake caret (selection) should be displayed in the content when the link input has focus and the browser does not render the native caret (selection). Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/4721">#4721</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ffac139a3e16dd013b68dfc1da34aba7bbd5b685">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>config.link.defaultProtocol</code> option for adding it automatically to the links when it's not provided by the user in the link form. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/4858">#4858</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/76c762e5a6549cb20de4331046bd324c992e95a0">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-theme-lark" rel="nofollow">theme-lark</a></strong>: Added styles for the fake link caret (selection) (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/4721">#4721</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ffac139a3e16dd013b68dfc1da34aba7bbd5b685">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-theme-lark" rel="nofollow">theme-lark</a></strong>: Added styles for a "fake caret" brought by the <code>WidgetTypeAround</code> plugin (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6693">#6693</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/eb8dd9f0e616cd5d15c3dc673508679d3061f547">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-typing" rel="nofollow">typing</a></strong>: Created a public <code>isNonTypingKeystroke()</code> helper (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6693">#6693</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/eb8dd9f0e616cd5d15c3dc673508679d3061f547">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-upload" rel="nofollow">upload</a></strong>: Introduced the <code>config.simpleUpload.withCredentials</code> request configuration. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7282">#7282</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/5a34216fadebeaf3acc5b88002eec4b841a1b17d">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-utils" rel="nofollow">utils</a></strong>: Created <code>isArrowKeyCode()</code>, <code>getLocalizedArrowKeyCodeDirection()</code>, and <code>isForwardArrowKeyCode()</code> helpers (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6693">#6693</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/eb8dd9f0e616cd5d15c3dc673508679d3061f547">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-widget" rel="nofollow">widget</a></strong>: Implemented keyboard support for inserting paragraphs around block widgets using a "fake horizontal caret" (<code>WidgetTypeAround</code>). Both "Insert new paragraph" buttons are now always displayed for all block widgets regardless of their location in the document. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6693">#6693</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6825">#6825</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6694">#6694</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/eb8dd9f0e616cd5d15c3dc673508679d3061f547">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-bug-fixes-17" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bug-fixes-17"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Bug fixes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-autoformat" rel="nofollow">autoformat</a></strong>: Autoformatting should not occur inside an existing text with a model <code>code</code> attribute. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/1239">#1239</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/ad3562a2d3b6d5a1e8de276e7f032371ba260d63">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The editor should not crash when the initial data includes HTML comments. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5734">#5734</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/377d142d9089e92a83d27eb386a3ef722fce847f">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: The model selection post-fixer should not set a new selection if the ranges before and after post-fixing are the same (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6693">#6693</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/eb8dd9f0e616cd5d15c3dc673508679d3061f547">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Backspace will no longer change the type of the trailing block. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6680">#6680</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/a87b364cce3fc70412031243ea0123333a91b821">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-font" rel="nofollow">font</a></strong>: The Font Family feature should apply the complete family value from the configuration when <code>config.fontFamily.supportAllValues</code> is <code>true</code>. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7285">#7285</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/c7b8f037891b885ae9d5d8c483747550ea8d6bd9">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The widget toolbar won't be shown if an empty collection of items was provided in the editor's configuration. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5857">#5857</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/64e53153737458bb0e64db16049b581e0ff8aae9">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-image" rel="nofollow">image</a></strong>: The <code>src</code> and <code>alt</code> attributes for the image element will be always added to the editor's data. Even if they are empty. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/5033">#5033</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/e81cbbba4bd0ccddc4ce0e59260c8f733bf12ca4">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Table multi-cell selection should not be possible with the keystrokes when the <code>TableSelection</code> plugin is disabled. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7483">#7483</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/2fee736a59ee6e1da2b85aff429398d96fd5c57b">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Copied and pasted table fragment should maintain the proper structure when the fragment contains merged table cells. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7245">#7245</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/17d7bd7390aeae841f6d2116a3528ea288367b3f">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Removing empty rows will no longer produce an invalid table model in certain scenarios. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6609">#6609</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/11d69fc808b4db5184ff90e0d0a2756761db4707">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-ui" rel="nofollow">ui</a></strong>: The <code>BalloonToolbar</code> should not show up when multiple objects (for instance, table cells) are selected at a time. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6443">#6443</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/6036d4a4983aba4f5e43704300dc38aeba7369f3">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h3 dir="auto"><a id="user-content-other-changes-17" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#other-changes-17"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Other changes</h3>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Added the <code>ignoreMarkers</code> option to the <code>Model#hasContent()</code> method. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/61a6110dc204717bce88367b94a0287cc9d57816">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-engine" rel="nofollow">engine</a></strong>: Added Writer#cloneElement(). Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6819">#6819</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4c7114014afcfd06a304183a3b077d84dec6db3e">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-horizontal-line" rel="nofollow">horizontal-line</a></strong>: Improved the look of horizontal lines in the editor content. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7418">#7418</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/e8bff81931d31fb341cd88f87977d6ef7db45a74">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: The selection after inserting a link will land after the inserted element. Thanks to that a user will be able to type directly after the link without extending the link element. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/1016">#1016</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/0bf66e47ee02484d694d786023cc153312409287">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-link" rel="nofollow">link</a></strong>: After clicking at the beginning or end of the link element, the selection will land before/after the clicked element. Thanks to that a user will be able to typing before or after the link element as normal text without extending the link. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/1016">#1016</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/0bf66e47ee02484d694d786023cc153312409287">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-paragraph" rel="nofollow">paragraph</a></strong>: The <code>InsertParagraphCommand</code> should split ancestors of the <code>Position</code> to find a parent that allows <code>'paragraph'</code> (see <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6693">#6693</a>). (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/eb8dd9f0e616cd5d15c3dc673508679d3061f547">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-select-all" rel="nofollow">select-all</a></strong>: Improved the select-all feature so that it includes more and more content if the selection was anchored in a nested editable. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6621">#6621</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/6f59c78eb88335cabf0d39612b40c3b50fade41f">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Removed <code>options.asWidget</code> from most of the table converters which are never run in data pipeline. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/b127f41163559b4c12ccf100be309c0dbf7c2355">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Marker on table cells should be downcasted to CSS classes on cells (instead of wrapping the content). Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7360">#7360</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/48d80cb955eecae9e9f0afad51ac1c5cdc7c00c1">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Pasting a table into a table is more tolerant for whitespaces around a pasted table. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/7379">#7379</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/669d54f688bf1017cb6c09c557cee084ea01be90">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Extracted <code>TableMouse</code> plugin from <code>TableSelection</code> plugin. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6757">#6757</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/4d2f5f9b9f298601b332f304da66333c52673cb8">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Refactor values returned by the <code>TableWalker</code> iterator. Closes <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6785">#6785</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/65cfa13ec9a3f983b94a27b5a86e031687fad25d">commit</a>)</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ckeditor/ckeditor5-table" rel="nofollow">table</a></strong>: Add <code>row</code>, <code>startColumn</code>, and <code>endColumn</code> options to <code>TableWalker</code> constructor. See <a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/issues/6785">#6785</a>. (<a href="https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/commit/65cfa13ec9a3f983b94a27b5a86e031687fad25d">commit</a>)</li>
</ul>
